	<item>
				<title>2015 Google hosts 持续更新[转载]【更新于:2015-12-23】</title>
		<link>http://blog.whatisit.cn/archives/865</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 27 Jul 2015 01:30:33 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[tydqq]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.whatisit.cn/?p=865</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class="thumbnail aligncenter" style="color: #555555;" src="http://laod.cn/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/google.jpg" alt="2015 Google hosts 持续更新【更新于:2015-11-26】" width="686" height="218" />

<!--more-->
<div id="article-index" style="color: #555555;">
<ul id="index-ul" style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit;">
	<li style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit;"><a style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #555555;" title="修改hosts的方法和下载地址如下：" href="http://laod.cn/hosts/2015-google-hosts.html#title-0">修改hosts的方法和下载地址如下：</a></li>
	<li style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit;"><a style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #555555;" title="修改hosts后生效的方法：" href="http://laod.cn/hosts/2015-google-hosts.html#title-1">修改hosts后生效的方法：</a></li>
	<li style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit;"><a style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #555555;" title="历史更新：" href="http://laod.cn/hosts/2015-google-hosts.html#title-2">历史更新：</a></li>
</ul>
</div>
<p style="color: #555555;">本页面长期更新<a class="tag_link" style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #555555;" title="浏览关于“Google”的文章" href="http://laod.cn/tag/google" target="_blank">Google</a>、谷歌学术、维基百科、ccFox.info、ProjectH、3DM、Battle.NET 、WordPress、Microsoft Live、GitHub、Box.com、SoundCloud、inoreader、Feedly、FlipBoard、Twitter、Facebook、Flickr、imgur、DuckDuckGo、Ixquick、Google Services、Google apis、Android、Youtube、Google Drive、UpLoad、Appspot、Googl eusercontent、Gstatic、Google other、Google Play等<a class="tag_link" style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #555555;" title="浏览关于“hosts”的文章" href="http://laod.cn/tag/hosts" target="_blank">hosts</a>。</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><strong style="font-style: inherit;">但是大多時候，只更新Google ip，因为工程量巨大。</strong></p>

<h3 id="title-0" style="color: #555555;">修改hosts的方法和下载地址如下：</h3>
<p style="color: #555555;"><span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #008000;">1. 找到hosts这个文件，在Windows 系统下是位于<span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;"> C:\WINDOWS\system32\drivers\etc</span><strong style="font-style: inherit;"> </strong>目录里。</span></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #008000;">2. 以记事本的方式打开hosts，添加以下文档中的地址并保存就可以了，注意hosts文件没有后缀。</span></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #008000;">如果是用<span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;">linux</span>系统的同学，请修改 <span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;">/etc/hosts</span><strong style="font-style: inherit;"> </strong>这个文件。</span></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #008000;">如果是<span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;">苹果电脑</span>（<span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;">Mac</span> ）请打开你的文件管理器（也就是<span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;">Finder</span>）</span>
<span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #008000;">然后，请按快捷键组合“Shift+Command+G”三个组合按键查找文件，并输入Hosts文件的所在路径：<span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;">/etc/hosts</span></span>
<span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #008000;">其次，在打开的文件夹中找到“Hosts”文件夹。</span></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #008000;"><strong style="font-style: inherit;"> </strong><span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;">安卓</span>（<span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;">Android</span>）用户：Android手机hosts文件路径：<span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;">/system/etc/</span></span></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;">Linux、Mac、Android用户请用Notepad++ 转换文本编码和换行符格式。</span></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #008000;">直接用手机浏览器下载老D提供的hosts文件（百度网盘里的，不带.txt后缀的）用 RE管理器 （前提需要手机已Root）复制或者移动至 <span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;">/system/etc/</span> 文件夹下，粘貼或者<span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;">覆盖</span>即可。</span></p>

<h3 id="title-1" style="color: #555555;">修改hosts后生效的方法：</h3>
<ul style="color: #555555;">
	<li style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit;">Windows
开始 -&gt; 运行 -&gt; 输入cmd -&gt; 在CMD窗口输入</li>
	<li style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit;">
<div class="codecolorer-container text default" style="color: #000000;">
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tbody>
<tr>
<td class="line-numbers" style="color: #888888;">
<div>1</div></td>
<td>
<div class="text codecolorer">ipconfig /flushdns</div></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div></li>
	<li style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit;">Linux
终端输入</li>
</ul>
<div class="codecolorer-container text default" style="color: #000000;">
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tbody>
<tr>
<td class="line-numbers" style="color: #888888;">
<div>1</div></td>
<td>
<div class="text codecolorer">sudo rcnscd restart</div></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
<p style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit;">对于systemd发行版，请使用命令</p>

<div class="codecolorer-container text default" style="color: #000000;">
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tbody>
<tr>
<td class="line-numbers" style="color: #888888;">
<div>1</div></td>
<td>
<div class="text codecolorer">sudo systemctl restart NetworkManager</div></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
<p style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit;">如果不懂请都尝试下</p>

<ul>
	<li style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit;">Mac OS X终端输入</li>
	<li style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit;">
<div class="codecolorer-container text default" style="color: #000000;">
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tbody>
<tr>
<td class="line-numbers" style="color: #888888;">
<div>1</div></td>
<td>
<div class="text codecolorer">sudo killall -HUP mDNSResponder</div></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div></li>
	<li style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit;">Android
开启飞行模式 -&gt; 关闭飞行模式</li>
	<li style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit;">通用方法
拔网线(断网) -&gt; 插网线(重新连接网络)</li>
</ul>
&nbsp;
<p style="color: #555555;"><a class="fancybox" style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #555555;" title="2015 Google hosts 持续更新【更新于:2015-07-24】" href="http://laod.cn/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/hosts.png" rel="box"><img class=" size-full wp-image-480 aligncenter" style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit;" src="http://laod.cn/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/hosts.png" alt="2015 Google hosts 持续更新【更新于:2015-07-24】-老D" width="984" height="653" /></a></p>


<hr style="color: #555555;" />

<h2 class="yinyong" style="color: #555555;"><span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit;">更新于：2015-10-26</span></h2>
<p style="color: #555555;"><span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;">本地查看&amp;下载：hosts-201511（服务器资源有限，已取消本地下载！）</span></p>

<blockquote style="color: #555555;"><span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;">里面包含Windows &amp; Mac 、Android &amp; Linux请对号入座。</span>

<a class="btn download-button" style="font-style: inherit; color: #ffffff;" href="http://pan.baidu.com/s/1eQoFzKA" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">http://pan.baidu.com/s/1eQoFzKA</a><strong style="font-style: inherit;"><span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #ff0000;">（提取码：qwsk）解压密码：laod.org</span></strong>
（如windows系統 直接覆盖 <strong style="font-style: inherit;">C:\WINDOWS\system32\drivers\etc </strong>下的<strong style="font-style: inherit;">hosts</strong>文件）

<span style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; color: #0bb4de;">天朝封杀Google IP已愈来愈强，找个能用的ip也越来越难，悠着点用吧！</span></blockquote>
<blockquote style="color: #555555;">

	<item>
				<title>十个国外VPS主机购买使用对比：稳定,便宜,方便的VPS主机使用评测</title>
		<link>http://blog.whatisit.cn/archives/886</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 29 Jul 2015 07:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[tydqq]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.whatisit.cn/?p=886</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="color: #000000;"><a class="highslide-image" style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_00.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-39986" src="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_00.jpg" alt="十个国外VPS主机购买使用对比：稳定,便宜,方便的VPS主机使用评测" width="550" height="130" /></a></p>
<p style="color: #000000;">写这篇文章的目的就是为了给新手朋友们挑选国外便宜VPS主机的一个参考。<!--more-->

现在国外的便宜VPS如“雨后春笋”般地层出不穷，但是VPS倒闭和删除用户账号等一系列问题也是“接踵而至”，VPS市场充斥着各种陷阱，初入者如果不擦亮眼睛很可能买到失望的产品。</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">上一次部落写过一篇关于VPS主机的总结性的文章：<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/7-vps/" target="_blank">七个国外便宜VPS主机使用体验</a>，让我没有想到的排在第一位的BurstNET居然倒闭了，原本对一些老牌VPS的“坚挺”有足够的信心又瞬间凌乱了。好在BurstNET关闭前，给了用户足够长的时间来迁移数据，这也算是一个责任吧。</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">使用国外的<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/category/vps-zhuji/" target="_blank">VPS主机</a>主要有两个问题：一是付款。只有部分VPS主机商是可以使用国内的支付宝付款，而多数国外的VPS主机只能使用Paypal或者信用卡来购买。二是售后问题。对于无人管理型的VPS主机，除非是宕机或者机房断网，VPS出现的其它的问题都不会过问。VPS主机影响到整个机房则可能面临关停不能恢复的风险。</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">这一点，对于国人来说尤其是比较看重的。因为语言和地域上的差别，国人在购买了国外的VPS主机遇到矛盾与纠纷时，往往处于一种劣势，申诉等基本上没有机会，想要追回付款只能是采用基本的办法，例如Paypal提供的争议和补偿申请就是迫于无奈下的办法：<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/paypal-clixsense/" target="_blank">Paypal争议和补偿申请退款</a> 。</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">除了VPS主机可供参考外，部落还总结了不少关于免费空间、美国主机、网赚等方面的文章，有兴趣的朋友们可以借鉴一下：</p>

<ul style="color: #000000;">
	<li>1、美国主机：<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/2014-us-hosting/" target="_blank">2014美国主机,网站域名,SSL证书使用的七点总结-网站搬家,域名转移,SSL安装</a></li>
	<li>2、免费空间：<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/2014-top-ten-web-hosting/" target="_blank">2014年十大优秀免费空间排行-稳定,速度,可靠和专业的免费主机空间</a></li>
	<li>3、网赚基本操作路径：<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/2014-money-online/" target="_blank">网站赚钱的入门8步-总结站长网赚的基本途径和方法</a></li>
</ul>
<p style="color: #000000;"><strong>十个国外VPS主机购买使用对比：稳定,便宜,方便的VPS主机使用评测</strong></p>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a style="color: #2583ad;" name="toc-1"></a><strong>一、Google Compute Engine谷歌云服务器平台</strong></p>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a class="highslide-image" style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_01.gif"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-39987" src="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_01.gif" alt="Google Compute Engine谷歌云服务器平台" width="500" height="240" /></a></p>
<p style="color: #000000;">1、Google Compute Engine是由谷歌推出的云服务器平台，它与亚马逊<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/tag/amazon-aws/" target="_blank">Amazon AWS</a>、微软<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/tag/windows-azure/" target="_blank">Windows Azure</a>应该算是国外三个有实力背景的云计算平台，GCE部落体验得不是很多，主要是因为GCE需要用信用卡才能支付，但是作为谷歌的产品还是有其强大之处。</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">2、经过一系列的持续开发，Google Compute Engine在数据中心、跨区域备份、SSD 硬盘、数据存储及分发等方面逐渐缩小了与Amazon AWS之间的差距，DNS解析采用Google Domains 和 Google Cloud DNS，主机机房在美国和亚太地区都有，国内连接GCE服务器速度比较快。</p>

<ul style="color: #000000;">
	<li>1、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/google-compute-engine/" target="_blank">Google Compute Engine云服务器激活开通和使用图文教程</a></li>
	<li>2、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/ssh-gce-vps/" target="_blank">Google Compute Engine云服务器SSH管理和GCE VPS性能测试</a></li>
	<li>3、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/amh-gce/" target="_blank">轻巧AMH虚拟主机面板安装使用和GCE云空间搭建网站实例</a></li>
</ul>
<p style="color: #000000;"><strong>二、Linode 便宜稳定强大的美国日本新加坡VPS主机</strong></p>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a class="highslide-image" style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_02.gif"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-39988" src="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_02.gif" alt="Linode 便宜稳定强大的美国日本新加坡VPS主机" width="500" height="240" /></a></p>
<p style="color: #000000;">1、如果说Google Compute Engine适合企业用户购买使用的话，那么Linode 就应该适合个人用户来购买使用了。不管是从VPS主机的价格、配置还是服务支持，Linode 都应该算是VPS界做得相当好的典型代表了，在美国、日本、新加坡等都有自己的机房，连接国内的速度快。</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">2、Linode VPS主机1GB内存、24GB SSD硬盘、2TB月流量，只需要10美元一个月。这个性价比即便国内的<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/tag/aliyun/" target="_blank">阿里云</a>也根本无法与其相比。Linode VPS还有强大的VPS管理后台，IP绑定、数据迁移、硬盘扩容等都是可视化的操作，Linode VPS的客服支持响应速度非常快。</p>

<ul style="color: #000000;">
	<li>1、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/linode-vps-10/" target="_blank">10美元Linode日本美国便宜VPS主机购买和Linode VPS速度性能评测</a></li>
	<li>2、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/linode-clone-ip-swap/" target="_blank">Linode搬家Clone克隆,IP Swap换IP,降级升级和负载均衡NodeBalancers</a></li>
	<li>3、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/linode-vps-tuikuan/" target="_blank">删除Linode VPS主机获得退款方法和Linode好友注册奖励20美元</a></li>
</ul>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a style="color: #2583ad;" name="toc-2"></a><strong>三、Vultr 便宜的美国、日本、欧洲等VPS主机</strong></p>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a class="highslide-image" style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_03.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-39989" src="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_03.jpg" alt="Vultr 便宜的美国、日本、欧洲等VPS主机" width="500" height="240" /></a></p>
<p style="color: #000000;">1、Vultr无论从VPS主机架构还是网站界面上，看得出来是想做第二个“Linode”，目前Vultr提供了美国、日本、欧洲等地区的VPS主机。Vultr与Linode相比，有两个优点：一是可以用Paypal付款，Linode只能使用信用卡来购买；二是日本机房比较充足，Linode东京机房已经有半年时间没有开卖了。</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">2、Vultr的VPS主机配置高价格便宜，计费也和Linode一样采用按时计费的方式，国内电信走的是电信到日本机房的快捷线路，速度还可以。Vultr支持“Custom ISO”，你可以自己上传Windows ISO来安装Windows系统，用Linux VPS的钱应用于Windows VPS上，这也是好多人愿意去购买Vultr的原因。</p>

<ul style="color: #000000;">
	<li>1、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/vultr-vps-zhuji/" target="_blank">Vultr便宜的日本美国欧洲VPS主机购买使用和服务器性能测评</a></li>
	<li>2、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/vultr-vps-speed/" target="_blank">Vultr日本美国VPS主机性能和速度测试报告</a></li>
	<li>3、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/vultr-vps/" target="_blank">Vultr日本美国便宜VPS主机购买和使用方法-免费2月试用充值送美元</a></li>
</ul>
<p style="color: #000000;"><strong>四、VPS.NET 专业的日本、新加坡、美国VPS主机</strong></p>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a class="highslide-image" style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_04.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-39990" src="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_04.jpg" alt="VPS.NET 专业的日本、新加坡、美国VPS主机" width="500" height="240" /></a></p>
<p style="color: #000000;">1、VPS.NET 是UK2Group旗下以专注提供VPS主机的公司，VPS.NET 的VPS主机的机房设立在日本、新加坡、美国等，不同的机房的VPS主机的价格也会不一样，美国和欧洲地区的VPS主机最便宜，只要15美元/月就可以购买到。</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">2、不过，VPS.NET 的VPS主机的性价比却远不如上面的Linode、Vultr等，就拿最便宜的一款VPS主机来说，15美元也就只能购买到512MB内存、10Gb硬盘、3TB月流量的VPS配置，该配置在新加坡、日本更是高达25美元。</p>

<ul style="color: #000000;">
	<li>1、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/vps-net/" target="_blank">VPS.NET香港日本VPS主机$10/月购买开通过程和VPS性能测试</a></li>
	<li>2、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/vps-net-xufei/" target="_blank">VPS.NET香港日本VPS主机Paypal续费方法和几点使用感受</a></li>
</ul>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a style="color: #2583ad;" name="toc-3"></a><strong>五、Host1plus 便宜的可用支付宝付款VPS主机</strong></p>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a class="highslide-image" style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_05.gif"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-39991" src="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_05.gif" alt="Host1plus 便宜的可用支付宝付款VPS主机" width="500" height="240" /></a></p>
<p style="color: #000000;">1、Host1plus 的VPS主机实在是太便宜的，便宜得不得不让人感觉得有些不放心。VPS主机最低一款内存有256MB，价格为2.5美元，可以用支付宝付款。对于Host1plus印象比较好的原因可能是Host1plus之前一直为大家提供免费VPS主机<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/tag/host1free/" target="_blank">Host1Free</a>，VPS服务还算放人信任。</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">2、Host1plus的产品包括虚拟主机、VPS、服务器、域名等等，机房可以选择德国、美国、巴西、非洲，OpenVZ架构，美国机房主机位于美国东海岸，所在连接国内的速度不是很快，Ping值也偏高。低配置的VPS主机适合学习测试之用。</p>

<ul style="color: #000000;">
	<li>1、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/host1plus-vps-alipay/" target="_blank">Host1plus便宜VPS主机用支付宝购买方法和VPS主机性能速度测试</a></li>
	<li>2、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/host1plus-hosting/" target="_blank">Host1plus虚拟主机支付宝购买年付送域名和host1plus主机速度测试</a></li>
</ul>
<p style="color: #000000;"><strong>六、RamNode 便宜的OpenVZ SSD和KVM SSD VPS主机</strong></p>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a class="highslide-image" style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_06.gif"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-39992" src="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_06.gif" alt="RamNode 便宜的OpenVZ SSD和KVM SSD VPS主机" width="500" height="240" /></a></p>
<p style="color: #000000;">1、RamNode的VPS主机还是以价格便宜为主，有OpenVZ SSD和KVM SSD VPS两种，最便宜的一款是3.5美元一个月，配置为内存256MB，硬盘8GB，月流量是1000Gb，在美国New York City、Atlanta、Seattle、Los Angeles等都有机房。</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">2、RamNode提供VPS主机也已经有了几年了，VPS主机的价格一直走的低端线路，好在VPS主机的质量还过得去，现在发展势头还可以，用户也在不断增加当中。国内用户要购买RamNode的VPS主机的话，可以使用Paypal来付款，购买后是立即开通的。</p>

<ul style="color: #000000;">
	<li>1、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/ramnode/" target="_blank">RamNode便宜VPS主机购买开通过程和VPS性能测试结果</a></li>
	<li>2、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/ramnode-host/" target="_blank">RamNode便宜VPS管理使用:重装系统搭建网站和服务器</a></li>
</ul>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a style="color: #2583ad;" name="toc-4"></a><strong>七、Virpus 老牌的VPS主机服务商</strong></p>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a class="highslide-image" style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_07.gif"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-39993" src="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_07.gif" alt="Virpus 老牌的VPS主机服务商" width="500" height="240" /></a></p>
<p style="color: #000000;">1、Virpus算是国外一批比较早提供VPS主机服务的主机商了，部落用的最早的VPS就是从Virpus开始的。从最开始的XEN VPS，到现在的SSD VPS、SSD-Cache VPS 等，可以看出Virpus一直在不断改进当中，当然Virpus还有便宜的服务器。</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">2、Virpus最便宜的一款SSD-Cache VPS 主机是4核心，内存1GB、SSD-Cache DISK为50GB、月流量为3TB，月付是5美元/月，支持使用Paypal付款。Virpus有时会推出一些特价的独立服务器，价格在50美元/月左右。</p>

<ul style="color: #000000;">
	<li>1、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/virpus-4-5/" target="_blank">Virpus美国便宜VPS 512M的XEN $4.5/月购买使用和性能速度测评</a></li>
</ul>
<p style="color: #000000;"><strong>八、YardVPS 支持支付宝付款的便宜VPS主机</strong></p>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a class="highslide-image" style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_08.gif"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-39994" src="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_08.gif" alt="YardVPS 支持支付宝付款的便宜VPS主机" width="500" height="240" /></a></p>
<p style="color: #000000;">1、YardVPS据说是由几个华人开办的VPS主机服务，属于PhotonVPS旗下，VPS产品一直以低价来吸引用户，数据中心是在美国的洛杉矶。YardVPS的VPS主机都是无管理型的，提供包括XEN PV和windows系统的VPS产品。</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">2、YardVPS一直走低端路线，价格比较低，但是VPS主机的配置比较高，最便宜的一款VPS主机的价格是7.95美元/月，采用Xen虚拟技术，内存768 MB，硬盘30GB，月流量是1500GB，一个独立IP地址，可以使用支付宝付款。</p>

<ul style="color: #000000;">
	<li>1、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/yardvps/" target="_blank">YardVPS美国便宜VPS终身五折支付宝$3.9/月512MB内存1.5TB月流量</a></li>
</ul>
<p style="color: #000000;"><strong>九、OneAsiaHost 来自新加坡的VPS主机商</strong></p>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a class="highslide-image" style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_09.gif"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-39995" src="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_09.gif" alt="OneAsiaHost 来自新加坡的VPS主机商" width="500" height="240" /></a></p>
<p style="color: #000000;">1、OneAsiaHost是一家来自新加坡的VPS主机和服务器服务商，VPS主机支持Paypal付款，加上价格比较便宜，机房位于新加坡，连接国内速度稍快，所以赢得了不少国人的喜欢。</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">2、关于OneAsiaHost 的评价，有好的也有不好的，主要在于OneAsiaHost 强硬的交易规则，VPS主机购买后不允许退款和付款后还得等上两天时间才可以开通VPS，稍有不慎会导致删除账号。</p>

<ul style="color: #000000;">
	<li>1、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/oneasiahost/" target="_blank">新加坡OneAsiaHost购买过程和VPS性能测评附net-speeder网速优化器使用</a></li>
</ul>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a style="color: #2583ad;" name="toc-5"></a><strong>十、Conoha.jp 日本高速便宜VPS主机</strong></p>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a class="highslide-image" style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_10.gif"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-39996" src="http://img.freehao123.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/2014-ten-vps_10.gif" alt="Conoha.jp 日本高速便宜VPS主机" width="500" height="240" /></a></p>
<p style="color: #000000;">1、Conoha.jp是日本GMO集团下的以提供VPS服务器为主的网络服务商，认识Conoha.jp是因为Conoha.jp在前一段时间为大家提供免费一个月的日本VPS主机试用，VPS主机配置和体验都表现不错。1G内存2核100G硬盘，100M共享带宽，KVM架构，信用卡月付为1300日元。</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">2、Conoha.jp的VPS主机机房位于日本，连接国内的速度比较快，在使用Conoha.jp的VPS主机时不会出现延时的问题。Conoha.jp的 VPS主机亮点在于强大和方便的后台管理面板，安装操作系统和执行相关的命令等都可以在Conoha.jp的管理后台中完成。</p>

<ul style="color: #000000;">
	<li>1、<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/conoha-jp/" target="_blank">Conoha.jp日本免费试用VPS主机和VPS主机性能测试体验</a></li>
</ul>
<p style="color: #000000;"><a style="color: #2583ad;" name="toc-6"></a><strong>国外VPS主机购买使用小结</strong></p>
<p style="color: #000000;">1、其实看了上面的便宜VPS购买和使用介绍，再来对比一下阿里云最近推出的美国阿里云VPS主机，瞬间感觉阿里云的VPS主机性价比已经无足轻重了，国内的VPS主机的带宽可以按照1MB的价格来卖，美国的VPS主机敢用把带宽卖出高价的也就阿里云一个了。</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">2、我们购买<a style="color: #2583ad;" href="http://www.freehao123.com/tag/guowai-vps/" target="_blank">国外VPS</a>主机有一个非常重要的“看点”就是VPS主机的速度要好，由于地理环境的原因实际使用的过程中日本东京、香港、新加坡等亚太地区的机房连接国内的速度比较理想，这些地方的机房也是大家关注的重点，价格也会比美国地区机房的VPS要贵一些。</p>

	<item>
				<title>搭建CentOS PPTP VPN翻墙</title>
		<link>http://blog.whatisit.cn/archives/894</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 30 Jul 2015 08:51:09 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[tydqq]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.whatisit.cn/?p=894</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="color: #767676;">对于想翻墙访问国外网站的朋友们有口福了</p>
<p style="color: #767676;">这里介绍两种配置方式</p>
<p><!--more--></p>
<h1 style="color: #443f3f;">第一种</h1>
<p style="color: #767676;">使用conoha.jp免安装linux进行配置</p>
<p style="color: #767676;">默认安装centos6.5 64位系统</p>
<p style="color: #767676;">centos6.4安装搭建pptp vpn服务的<span style="font-weight: 600;">大致步骤</span></p>
<p style="color: #767676;"><span style="font-weight: 600;">第一步:</span>检测是否符合pptp的搭建环境的要求</p>
<p style="color: #767676;">这里也不需要检测了，本人已经测试通过直接进入下一步</p>
<p style="color: #767676;"><span style="font-weight: 600;">第二步:</span></p>
<p style="color: #767676;">1.安装ppp和iptables</p>
<p style="color: #767676;">终端输入</p>
<blockquote style="font-style: italic; color: #999999;"><p>#yum install -y perl ppp iptables</p></blockquote>
<p style="color: #767676;">2.安装<span style="font-weight: 600;">pptpd</span></p>
<blockquote style="font-style: italic; color: #999999;"><p>#rpm -Uvh http://poptop.sourceforge.net/yum/stable/rhel6/pptp-release-current.noarch.rpm</p>
<p>#yum install pptpd</p></blockquote>
<p style="color: #767676;"><span style="font-weight: 600;">第三步：修改配置文件</span></p>
<p style="color: #767676;">1.<span style="font-weight: 600;">配置文件/etc/ppp/options.pptpd</span></p>
<blockquote style="font-style: italic; color: #999999;"><p>#mv /etc/ppp/options.pptpd /etc/ppp/options.pptpd.bak<br />
#vi /etc/ppp/options.pptpd</p></blockquote>
<p style="color: #767676;"><span style="font-weight: 600;">options.pptpd</span>内容如下：</p>
<blockquote style="font-style: italic; color: #999999;"><p>name pptpd<br />
refuse-pap<br />
refuse-chap<br />
refuse-mschap<br />
require-mschap-v2<br />
require-mppe-128<br />
proxyarp<br />
lock<br />
nobsdcomp<br />
novj<br />
novjccomp<br />
nologfd<br />
idle 2592000<br />
ms-dns 8.8.8.8<br />
ms-dns 8.8.4.4</p></blockquote>
<p style="color: #767676;">解析：ms-dns 8.8.8.8， ms-dns 8.8.4.4是使用google的dns服务器。</p>
<p style="color: #767676;">2.<span style="font-weight: 600;">配置文件/etc/ppp/chap-secrets</span></p>
<blockquote style="font-style: italic; color: #999999;"><p>#cp   /etc/ppp/chap-secrets /etc/ppp/chap-secrets.bak<br />
#vi  /etc/ppp/chap-secrets</p></blockquote>
<p style="color: #767676;"><span style="font-weight: 600;">chap-secrets</span>内容如下：</p>
<blockquote style="font-style: italic; color: #999999;"><p># Secrets for authentication using CHAP<br />
# client server secret IP addresses<br />
myusername      pptpd     mypassword     *</p>
<p>//myusername是你的vpn帐号，mypassword是你的vpn的密码，*表示对任何ip，记得不要丢了这个星号。我这里根据这个格式，假设我的vpn的帐号是ksharpdabu，密码是 sky。那么，应该如下：</p>
<p>ksharpdabu pptpd sky *</p></blockquote>
<p style="color: #767676;">3.<span style="font-weight: 600;">配置文件/etc/pptpd.conf</span></p>
<p style="color: #767676;">#cp   /etc/pptpd.conf /etc/pptpd.conf.bak<br />
#vi /etc/pptpd.conf</p>
<p style="color: #767676;"><span style="font-weight: 600;">pptpd.conf</span>内容如下：</p>
<blockquote style="font-style: italic; color: #999999;"><p><span style="font-weight: 600;">option /etc/ppp/options.pptpd</span><br />
logwtmp<br />
localip 192.168.9.1<br />
remoteip 192.168.9.11-30 //表示vpn客户端获得ip的范围</p></blockquote>
<p style="color: #767676;"><span style="font-weight: 600;">如果连接vpn后较卡</span>：</p>
<blockquote style="font-style: italic; color: #999999;"><p>/sbin/iptables -I FORWARD -p tcp --syn -i ppp+ -j TCPMSS --set-mss 1356</p>
<p>/etc/ppp/options.pptpd 最後一行mtu 1300 +空行</p></blockquote>
<h1 style="color: #443f3f;"></h1>
]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>Windows 7 和 Windows 8* 連接VPN操作步驟</title>

		<description></description>

Telephony

Remote Access Connection Manager

Remote Access Auto Connection Manager

Remote Procedure Call (RPC) Locator

Network Connections

	<item>
				<title>PPTP-VPN For CentOS6.4</title>
		<link>http://blog.whatisit.cn/archives/906</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 03 Aug 2015 07:20:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[tydqq]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.whatisit.cn/?p=906</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div style="color: #555555;"><center></center></div>
<p style="color: #555555;">今天在vps上装pptp ，和以往一样，只不过不是在自己的vps上，上次ssh代理被封ip，对我的身心造成了深深的影响，所以，这次拿网友放我这的vps来搭建vpn环境。pptp的搭建比openvpn容易多了。以下是我的配置过程，其实和网上差不多，<span style="color: #888888;">centos6.4 搭建 centos 6.4 搭建pptp vpn <!--more-->

</span><span style="color: #008000;">ppp = 2.4.4 is needed by pptpd-1.3.4-2.rhel5.x86_64</span></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: #ff0000;"><span style="color: #000000;">centos6.4安装搭建pptp vpn服务的</span><strong>大致步骤简介，下面会有详细的步骤</strong><span style="color: #000000;">(我不喜欢写大纲，决定麻烦，但是有人还</span><span style="color: #000000;">是看不懂，所以勉为其难的</span><span style="color: #000000;">写了个，实在不会的，我在文章的后面提供一些网上的<span style="color: #ff0000;">centos pptp vpn 一键安装包</span>，有人写了就不必再写一遍了，一键安装包要是有问题，也别找我，新手想享受自己亲手一步步具</span><span style="color: #000000;">体搭建过程的乐趣，就接着看看吧)<strong><span style="color: #ff0000;">：</span></strong></span></span></p>

<blockquote style="color: #555555;">1.先检查vps是否满足配置pptp vpn的环境。因为有的openvz的vps被母鸡给禁用了。其实，你在配置前最好向vps的客服发TK，可能客服会帮你开通vpn或者客服那里会给你他们自己定制的vpn一键安装包也有可能。
2.接着是安装配置pptp vpn的相关软件，<strong>安装ppp和iptables</strong>。
配置安装好后的pptp软件，这个不像windows那样，安装的过程就是配置的过程。linux的要安装完之后，修改配置文件，才算是完成配置。
3.启动pptp vpn 服务。此时，就是检验你能够vpn拨号成功，如果你拨号成功了，说明你的pptp vpn的安装配置就算真正的完成了。但是此时只能登录vpn，却不能用来上网。
4.开启内核和iptables的转发功能。这个步骤是为了让你连上vpn之后，能够上网，上那些yourporn，youtube之类的。这步是最关键的，很多人能成功拨号，登录vpn，但是却不能上网就是因为这个步骤没做好。这步骤完成了，你就可以尽情去国外的网站访问了。</blockquote>
<p style="color: #555555;">#########################################手动搭建配置pptp vpn 详细方法如下########</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><strong>第一步</strong>：检测是否符合pptp的搭建环境的要求</p>

<div style="color: #555555;">服务器版本：CentOs 6.4 <span style="color: #ff0000;">xen vps</span></div>
<div style="color: #555555;">
<div></div>
<div>这里说一下，如果你的linux内核版本<span style="color: #000000;"> 等于或高于 2.6.15 ，内核集成了MPPE。可以用下面命令进行测试内核是否支持</span></div>
<div>
<blockquote>#modprobe ppp-compress-18 &amp;&amp; echo ok</blockquote>
</div>
<div>返回“ok”说明测试通过。但是返回报错“FATAL: Module ppp_mppe not found.”，也不能说不支持，因为modprobe命令是去 /lib/modules/`uname -r` 找模块，但是很多时候，这个目录下是空的。所以这个命令没什么太大用处。</div>
<div></div>
<div>于是有人又提出一个命令，通过查看内核编译的配置文件config.gz：</div>
<div>
<blockquote>#zgrep MPPE /proc/config.gz</blockquote>
</div>
<div>返回CONFIG_PPP_MPPE=y 或 =m说明内核已经编译了MPPE，通过测试。但是呢，这个命令其实也没什么用，因为有的vps空间商会不会备份config.gz文件。所以，config.gz文件都没有，这命令也是废了。</div>
<div></div>
<div>所以，最后建议直接使用下面的指令：</div>
<blockquote>#cat /dev/net/tun</blockquote>
<div>如果这条指令显示结果为下面的文本，则表明通过：</div>
<div>cat: /dev/net/tun: File descriptor in bad state</div>
<div>上述任意一个命令测试通过，就能安装pptp。否则就只能考虑openvpn。</div>
<div>确认自己的vps能够支持pptp vpn 或其他类型的vpn。最好的方法是直接问vps空间商，因为没有人比他们更清楚了。没准人家还会提供vpn一键安装包呢！！！</div>
<div>有部分的vps需要发tk，让vps空间商的技术客服为你的VPS打开TUN/TAP/PPP功能了，而有部分vps控制面板上提供打开TUN/TAP/PPP功能的按钮，自己就能手动开启。</div>
<div></div>
<div>
<div><strong><span style="color: #ff0000;">Centos 6.4内核版本在2.6.15以上，都默认集成了MPPE和PPP，因此下面检查可以忽略：</span></strong></div>
<div><span style="color: #ffffff;"><strong>http://www.dabu.info/?p=2178</strong></span></div>
<blockquote>#rpm -q ppp //查询当前系统的ppp是否默认集成了，以及ppp的版本</blockquote>
<div></div>
<div>检查PPP是否支持MPPE</div>
<div>用以下命令检查PPP是否支持MPPE：</div>
<blockquote>#strings ‘/usr/sbin/pppd’ |grep -i mppe | wc –lines</blockquote>
<div><span style="color: #ffffff;"><strong>http://www.dabu.info/?p=2178</strong></span></div>
<div>如果以上命令输出为“0”则表示不支持；输出为“30”或更大的数字就表示支持，MPPE（Microsoft Point to Point Encryption，微软点对点加密）。</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="color: #555555;"></div>
<div style="color: #555555;"><strong>第二步</strong>：</div>
<div style="color: #555555;"><strong>1.安装ppp和iptables</strong></div>
<div style="color: #555555;"></div>
<div style="color: #555555;">PPTPD要求Linux内核支持mppe，一般来说CentOS安装时已经包含了</div>
<div style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: #ffffff;"><strong>http://www.dabu.info/?p=2178</strong></span></div>
<blockquote style="color: #555555;">
<div>#yum install -y perl ppp iptables //centos默认安装了iptables和ppp</div>
<div></div></blockquote>
<div style="color: #555555;"></div>
<div style="color: #555555;"></div>
<div style="color: #555555;"><strong>2.安装pptpd</strong></div>
<div style="color: #555555;">

刚才用了yum安装了ppp,但是这里有个问题，几乎大部分的人都会在这里遇到ppp和pptpd不兼容的错误。因为yum安装ppp，总是安装最新版本的ppp，而由于安装的ppp的版本不同，那么就需要安装对应版本的pptpd才行。(参考我的文章《<a style="color: #428bca;" title="" href="http://www.dabu.info/ppp-2-4-4-is-needed-by-pptpd-1-3-4-2-rhel5-x86_64-solutions-and-reasons.html" data-original-title="">ppp = 2.4.4 is needed by pptpd-1.3.4-2.rhel5.x86_64的解决办法及原因</a>|<a style="color: #428bca;" title="" href="http://www.dabu.info/" data-original-title="">大步’s blog</a>》)

我们要先查看已经安装的ppp的版本，在去找对应的pptpd版本。我手头刚好有两个vps，一个是前年装的pptp vpn，一个是一年后装的pptp vpn，所以，装的yum install ppp的版本不同。

使用下面的命令查看ppp的版本，前提你是yum安装的ppp。

旧的vps上的ppp版本显示：

#yum list installed ppp

显示：
<blockquote>ppp.i386 <strong><span style="color: #ff0000;">2.4.4-2.el5 </span></strong>installed</blockquote>
新的vps上的ppp版本显示；

#yum list installed ppp

显示：
<blockquote>ppp.i686 <strong><span style="color: #ff0000;">2.4.5-5.el6 </span></strong>@base</blockquote>
所以，要对根据ppp版本选择对应的pptpd版本。这里我主要列出常用的。
<blockquote><strong><span style="color: #ff0000;">ppp 2.4.4——————&gt;pptpd 1.3.4</span></strong>

<strong><span style="color: #ff0000;">ppp 2.4.5——————&gt;pptpd 1.4.0</span></strong></blockquote>
贴个ppp和pptpd各个版本的下载地址；<a style="color: #428bca;" title="" href="http://poptop.sourceforge.net/yum/stable/packages/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow" data-original-title=""><strong><span style="color: #008000;">http://poptop.sourceforge.net/yum/stable/packages/</span></strong></a>

大家下载的时候注意，分清楚你系统的版本是64位的还是32位的。<span style="color: #0000ff;"><strong>我个人建议ppp用yum安装，pptpd用rpm的安装，因为如果全都rpm或者源码安装，依赖关系很是烦人。文件名含有数字64的就是64位版本，没有的就是32位版本。可以用下面的命令查看自己的系统是32位还是64位的。</strong></span>
<blockquote>#getconf LONG_BIT</blockquote>
下面假设我这里的ppp是2.4.4版本，然后安装pptpd

<strong><span style="color: #ff0000;">第一种</span></strong>安装pptpd的方法是直接用yum安装，让电脑自动选择对应的版本：

先<strong><span style="color: #ff0000;">加入yum源</span></strong>：
<blockquote>#rpm -Uvh http://poptop.sourceforge.net/yum/stable/rhel6/pptp-release-current.noarch.rpm</blockquote>
然后用yum安装pptpd：
<blockquote>#yum install pptpd</blockquote>
<span style="color: #008000;"><strong>这是最省时间和力气的。余下的和手动安装没什么区别了。</strong></span>

&nbsp;

<span style="color: #ff0000;"><strong>第二种</strong></span>是手动安装pptpd包：
<blockquote>对于32位CentOS，执行

wget http://acelnmp.googlecode.com/files/pptpd-1.3.4-1.rhel5.1.i386.rpm

rpm -ivh pptpd-1.3.4-1.rhel5.1.i386.rpm

对于64位CentOS，执行

wget http://acelnmp.googlecode.com/files/pptpd-1.3.4-1.rhel5.1.x86_64.rpm

rpm -ivh pptpd-1.3.4-1.rhel5.1.x86_64.rpm

这里贴上32位的pptpd的rpm的下载地址：

<a style="color: #428bca;" title="" href="http://www.400gb.com/file/34722122" target="_blank" rel="nofollow" data-original-title="">http://www.400gb.com/file/34722122</a></blockquote>
<h3 style="color: inherit;">64位安装的时候如果出现：<span style="color: #ffffff;"><strong>http://www.dabu.info/?p=2178</strong></span></h3>
<blockquote>warning: pptpd-1.3.4-2.rhel5.x86_64.rpm: Header V3 DSA/SHA1 Signature, key ID 862acc42: NOKEY
error: Failed dependencies:
<strong><span style="color: #339966;">ppp = 2.4.4 is needed by pptpd-1.3.4-2.rhel5.x86_64</span></strong>

<span style="color: #ff0000;">原因是pptpd与PPP不兼容，那么，此时用#yum list installed ppp 命令查看ppp版本，极有可能ppp是2.4.5版本的。所以，我们要下载pptp 1.4.0版本才行，而且这里是64位的系统。下载<span style="color: #0000ff;">pptpd-1.4.0-1.el6.x86_64.rpm</span>安装即可。这就是我说的出现版本不兼容的问题，当ppp版本和pptpd版本不兼容时候，就会出现类似的错误。</span>

这里我分享下pptpd 下载地址；

64位<span style="color: #0000ff;"><strong>pptpd-1.4.0-1.el6.x86_64.rpm</strong></span>的下载地址：<a style="color: #428bca;" title="" href="http://www.400gb.com/file/54124122" rel="nofollow" data-original-title="">http://www.pipipan.com/file/18457333</a>

<span style="color: #000000;">32位<strong><span style="color: #0000ff;">pptpd-1.4.0-1.el6.i686.rpm</span></strong>版本下载地址：<a style="color: #428bca;" title="" href="http://www.400gb.com/file/54124192" target="_blank" rel="nofollow" data-original-title="">http://www.400gb.com/file/54124192</a></span>

看到有人建议用–nodeps –force 这个参数，我个人不建议，这个参数可能以后会出现奇怪的问题，但是如果实在不行，你就用吧</blockquote>
&nbsp;

<strong>第三步：修改配置文件</strong>

1.<strong>配置文件/etc/ppp/options.pptpd</strong>
<blockquote>#cp /etc/ppp/options.pptpd /etc/ppp/options.pptpd.bak
#vi /etc/ppp/options.pptpd

解析：我还建议是在原配置文件上添加内容来配置pptp ，省的不必要的麻烦和问题</blockquote>
&nbsp;

<strong>将如下</strong>内容添加到到<strong>options.pptpd</strong>中：
<blockquote><span style="color: #ff0000;">ms-dns 8.8.8.8</span>
<span style="color: #ff0000;">ms-dns 8.8.4.4</span></blockquote>
然后保存这个文件。

解析：ms-dns 8.8.8.8， ms-dns 8.8.4.4是使用google的dns服务器。

2.<strong>配置文件/etc/ppp/chap-secrets</strong>
<blockquote>#cp /etc/ppp/chap-secrets   /etc/ppp/chap-secrets.bak
#vi /etc/ppp/chap-secrets</blockquote>
<strong>chap-secrets</strong>内容如下：
<blockquote># Secrets for authentication using CHAP
# client server secret IP addresses
myusername <span style="color: #ff0000;">pptpd </span>mypassword <span style="color: #ff0000;">*</span>

//myusername是你的vpn帐号，mypassword是你的vpn的密码，<span style="color: #ff0000;">*</span>表示对任何ip，记得不要丢了这个<span style="color: #ff0000;">星号</span>。我这里根据这个格式，假设我的vpn的帐号是<span style="color: #ff0000;">ksharpdabu</span>，密码是 <span style="color: #ff0000;">sky</span>。那么，应该如下：

<span style="color: #339966;">ksharpdabu pptpd sky *</span></blockquote>
&nbsp;

3.<strong>配置文件/etc/pptpd.conf</strong>

#cp /etc/pptpd.conf     /etc/pptpd.conf.bak
#vi /etc/pptpd.conf

<strong>添加下面两行</strong>：
<blockquote>localip 192.168.9.1
remoteip 192.168.9.11-30 //表示vpn客户端获得ip的范围</blockquote>
&nbsp;

<strong><span style="color: #ff0000;">关键点：<span style="color: #000000;"><strong>pptpd.conf这个配置文件必须保证最后是以空行结尾才行，否则会导致启动pptpd服务时，出现“Starting pptpd:”，一直卡着不动的问题，无法启动服务，切记呀！（相关文档可以查看：<a style="color: #428bca;" title="" href="http://www.dabu.info/starting-pptpd-does-not-run-down-turn.html" rel="bookmark" data-original-title="Starting pptpd: 运行不下去的原因(转)">Starting pptpd: 运行不下去的原因</a>）</strong></span></span></strong>

<span style="color: #008000;">ppp = 2.4.4 is needed by pptpd-1.3.4-2.rhel5.x86_64</span>

&nbsp;

4.<strong>配置文件/etc/sysctl.conf</strong>
<blockquote>#vi /etc/sysctl.conf //修改内核设置，使其支持转发</blockquote>
将<span style="color: #008000;">net.ipv4.ip_forward = 0 </span>改成 <span style="color: #008000;">net.ipv4.ip_forward = 1</span>

保存修改后的文件
<blockquote>#/sbin/sysctl -p</blockquote>
&nbsp;

<strong>第四步：启动pptp vpn服务和iptables</strong>
<blockquote>#/sbin/service pptpd start 或者 #service pptpd start</blockquote>
经过前面步骤，我们的VPN已经<strong>可以拨号登录</strong>了，但是还不能访问任何网页。最后一步就是添加iptables转发规则了，输入下面的指令：

<span style="color: #ff0000;">启动iptables和nat转发功能，很关键的呀</span>：

#/sbin/service iptables start //启动iptables

#/sbin/iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING <strong><span style="color: #0000ff;">-o eth0</span></strong> -s 192.168.<span style="color: #ff0000;">9</span>.0/24 -j MASQUERADE <strong><span style="color: #ff0000;">或者</span></strong>使用下面的一种：

#iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING <strong><span style="color: #0000ff;">-o eth0</span></strong> -s 192.168.<span style="color: #ff0000;">9</span>.0/24 -j SNAT <span style="color: #000000;"><span style="color: #ff0000;">–<span style="color: #339966;">–</span></span></span>to-source <span style="color: #ff0000;">207.210.83.140</span>

//<span style="color: #ff00ff;">注意：</span>命令中的 “<strong>-o eth0</strong>“是指定网卡名称，如果是多个网卡，就根据需要将 <strong>-o eth0</strong> 改成你  -o ethXX (ehtXX是你网卡的名称)   ，可以通过ifconfig 查看有哪那些连通外网的网卡，一般vps都是<strong><span style="color: #ff0000;">单网卡</span></strong>的，而且大都网卡默认名都叫eth0  。但是事情总是多样的，所以如果你的上网的网卡不是 叫 eth0  ，那么就必须去掉 <strong>-o eth0</strong>  。直接让系统判断你用的网卡，所以将上面的命令改成：

iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING<strong>   </strong> -s 192.168.<span style="color: #ff0000;">9</span>.0/24 -j SNAT <span style="color: #000000;"><span style="color: #ff0000;">–<span style="color: #339966;">–</span></span></span>to-source <span style="color: #ff0000;">207.210.83.140
</span>

&nbsp;

//你需要将207.210.83.140替换成你的<strong><span style="color: #ff0000;">vps的公网ip地址，因为这里我写的是我的。<span style="color: #000000;">还有就是有人说我这–to-source前只有一个横杠，其实是有两个横杠的。文章在编辑模式下显示是<span style="color: #ff0000;">两个横杠</span>，因为用的是英文输入法，所以，发表后就变成了一个横杆，而且在源码下复制粘贴也是一横，只有在编辑模式下才能看清楚是两横。但是可以明显看到to前面的那一横比source前的那横长一些，这些都是我操作记录下的命令，不会有错的。为了防止你们出错，我还是用不同的颜色标记吧。</span></span></strong>

这里我先前写的不是很详细，现在补上：
<ul>
	<li>需要注意的是，这个指令中的“192.168.9.0/24”是根据之前的配置文件中的“localip”网段来改变的(网上有的教程是192.168.<span style="color: #ff0000;">0</span>.0/24 )，比如你设置的 “10.0.0.1”网段，则应该改为“10.0.0.0/24”。此外还有一点需要注意的是eth0，如果你的外网网卡不是eth0，而是eth1（比 如SoftLayer的服务器就是这样的情况），那么请记得将eth0也更改为对应的网卡编号，不然是上不了网的！</li>
	<li>如果你的linux vps是ppp或者ADSL这种由DHCP动态分配获取ip的方式<span style="color: #008080;">（当然vps的ip基本都是是固定的。如果你是<span style="color: #ff0000;">XEN的vps</span>，那么这个转发规则其实<span style="color: #ff0000;"><strong>也是适用</strong></span></span>的，就是让vps自己判断自己的ip，省去了我们指定。），那么就需要用<span style="color: #ff0000;">-j MASQUERADE</span>这种写法，就是ip伪装。当然如果使用iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o eth0 -s 192.168.<span style="color: #ff0000;">9</span>.0/24 -j SNAT <span style="color: #ff0000;">–</span><span style="color: #339966;">–</span>to-source <span style="color: #ff0000;">XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX </span>这种转发规则其实也是可以的，这样亲自指定自己的vps的ip地址。以后你通过vpn访问网站，显示的就是这个ip了。</li>
</ul>
#/etc/init.d/iptables save //保存iptables的转发规则

#/sbin/service iptables restart //重新启动iptables

&nbsp;

<strong>最后一步：重启pptp vpn</strong>
<blockquote>#service pptpd restart</blockquote>
#############################################3

客户端如何拨号登陆vpn，我就不写了，大家可以自行google，因为系统那么多，我不可能xp，win7，centos，mac之类的每个都写，何况网上一大堆，只要你pptp vpn服务器搭建好了，客户端登陆的选择就是简单的事。如果这个也不知道，那我就没法了，自己动手吧。

&nbsp;

<strong>多余的步骤</strong>：设置pptp vpn 开机启动

有的人懒的重启后手动开启服务，所以下面我再补上开机自动启动pptp vpn 和 iptables的命令

#chkconfig pptpd on //开机启动pptp vpn服务

#chkconfig iptables on //开机启动iptables

&nbsp;

有问题请先看log，查google，百度，论坛，有的人连软件下载都不自己去搜索，对于这样的人，我也懒得理睬。

&nbsp;

贴个openvz的pptp vpn 一件安装包吧：centos，fedora，redhat  6.x 使用的脚本(vps上从没安装过的可以试试这个脚本，不保证一定成功，因为我没测试，只是根据上面的文章内容写的，嫌手动安装难打字):   <a style="color: #428bca;" title="" href="http://www.400gb.com/file/71869260" target="_blank" data-original-title="">点击下载</a>

<div class="crayon-num crayon-striped-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #317cc5 !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-72">72</div>

<div class="crayon-num crayon-striped-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #317cc5 !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-74">74</div>

<div class="crayon-num crayon-striped-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #317cc5 !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-76">76</div>

<div class="crayon-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-79">79</div>
<div class="crayon-num crayon-striped-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #317cc5 !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-80">80</div>
<div class="crayon-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-81">81</div>
<div class="crayon-num crayon-striped-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #317cc5 !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-82">82</div>
<div class="crayon-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-83">83</div>
<div class="crayon-num crayon-striped-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #317cc5 !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-84">84</div>
<div class="crayon-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-85">85</div>
<div class="crayon-num crayon-striped-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #317cc5 !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-86">86</div>
<div class="crayon-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-87">87</div>
<div class="crayon-num crayon-striped-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #317cc5 !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-88">88</div>
<div class="crayon-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-89">89</div>
<div class="crayon-num crayon-striped-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #317cc5 !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-90">90</div>
<div class="crayon-num" style="font-weight: inherit !important;" data-line="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-91">91</div>

<td class="crayon-code">

<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-1" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-p" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #b85c00 !important;">#!/bin/bash</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-2" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-c" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ff8000 !important;"># Interactive pptp vpn  install script for an OpenVZ VPS</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-3" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-c" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ff8000 !important;"># surport  : Cenost ,Fedora  6.x </span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-4" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-c" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ff8000 !important;"># Augest 24, 2014 v1.00</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-5" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-c" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ff8000 !important;">#url ：   http://www.dabu.info/?p=2178</span></div>

<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-7" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"######################################################"</span></div>

<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-9" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span></div>

<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-12" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"PPP can also be enabled from SolusVM."</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-13" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span></div>

<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-15" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"A separate user is required per connection or machine."</span></div>

<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-25" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-st" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">if</span><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">test</span><span class="crayon-v" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #002d7a !important;">$x</span><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">-</span><span class="crayon-i" style="font-weight: inherit !important;">eq</span><span class="crayon-cn" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ce0000 !important;">1</span><span class="crayon-sy" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #333333 !important;">;</span><span class="crayon-st" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">then</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-26" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Enter username that you want to create (eg. client1 or john):"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-27" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">read</span><span class="crayon-i" style="font-weight: inherit !important;">u</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-28" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Specify password that you want the server to use:"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-29" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">read</span><span class="crayon-v" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #002d7a !important;">p</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-30" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-31" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-c" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ff8000 !important;">## get the VPS IP</span></div>

<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-87" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-88" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-89" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"######################################################"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-90" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Restarting PoPToP"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-91" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"######################################################"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-92" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">sleep</span><span class="crayon-cn" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ce0000 !important;">5</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-93" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">/</span><span class="crayon-v" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #002d7a !important;">etc</span><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">/</span><span class="crayon-v" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #002d7a !important;">init</span><span class="crayon-e" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #004ed0 !important;">.d</span><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">/</span><span class="crayon-e" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #004ed0 !important;">pptpd </span><span class="crayon-e" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #004ed0 !important;">restart</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-94" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-95" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-96" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"######################################################"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-97" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Server setup complete!"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-98" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Connect to your VPS at $ip with these credentials:"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-99" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Username:$u ##### Password: $p"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-100" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"######################################################"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-101" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-102" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-c" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ff8000 !important;"># runs this if option 2 is selected</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-103" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-st" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">elif</span><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">test</span><span class="crayon-v" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #002d7a !important;">$x</span><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">-</span><span class="crayon-i" style="font-weight: inherit !important;">eq</span><span class="crayon-cn" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ce0000 !important;">2</span><span class="crayon-sy" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #333333 !important;">;</span><span class="crayon-st" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">then</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-104" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Enter username that you want to create (eg. client1 or john):"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-105" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">read</span><span class="crayon-i" style="font-weight: inherit !important;">u</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-106" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Specify password that you want the server to use:"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-107" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">read</span><span class="crayon-v" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #002d7a !important;">p</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-108" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-109" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-110" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-111" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-c" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ff8000 !important;"># adding new user</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-112" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"$u * $p *"</span><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">&gt;&gt;</span><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">/</span><span class="crayon-v" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #002d7a !important;">etc</span><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">/</span><span class="crayon-v" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #002d7a !important;">ppp</span><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">/</span><span class="crayon-v" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #002d7a !important;">chap</span><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">-</span><span class="crayon-e" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #004ed0 !important;">secrets</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-113" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-114" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-115" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"######################################################"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-116" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Addtional user added!"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-117" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Connect to your VPS at $ip with these credentials:"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-118" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Username:$u ##### Password: $p"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-119" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"######################################################"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-120" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-121" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-st" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">else</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-122" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Invalid selection, quitting."</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-123" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">exit</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e8633694981235280-124" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-st" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">fi</span></div>
</div></td>
</tr>

</table>
</div>
</div>
&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

复制下面代码到install.sh中，然后 sh isntall.sh。这个是只支持debian和ubuntu系列，centos不支持。

<td class="crayon-code">
<div class="crayon-pre">
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-1" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-p" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #b85c00 !important;">#!/bin/bash</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-2" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-c" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ff8000 !important;"># Interactive PoPToP install script for an OpenVZ VPS</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-3" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-c" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ff8000 !important;"># Tested on Debian 5, 6, and Ubuntu 11.04</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-4" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-c" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ff8000 !important;"># April 2, 2013 v1.11</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-5" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-c" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ff8000 !important;"># http://www.putdispenserhere.com/pptp-debian-ubuntu-openvz-setup-script/</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-6" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-7" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"######################################################"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-8" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Interactive PoPToP Install Script for an OpenVZ VPS"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-9" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-10" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Make sure to contact your provider and have them enable"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-11" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"IPtables and ppp modules prior to setting up PoPToP."</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-12" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"PPP can also be enabled from SolusVM."</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-13" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-14" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"You need to set up the server before creating more users."</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-15" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"A separate user is required per connection or machine."</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-16" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"######################################################"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-17" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-18" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-19" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"######################################################"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-20" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Select on option:"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-21" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"1) Set up new PoPToP server AND create one user"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-22" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"2) Create additional users"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-23" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"######################################################"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-24" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">read</span><span class="crayon-i" style="font-weight: inherit !important;">x</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-25" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-st" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">if</span><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">test</span><span class="crayon-v" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #002d7a !important;">$x</span><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">-</span><span class="crayon-i" style="font-weight: inherit !important;">eq</span><span class="crayon-cn" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ce0000 !important;">1</span><span class="crayon-sy" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #333333 !important;">;</span><span class="crayon-st" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">then</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-26" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Enter username that you want to create (eg. client1 or john):"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-27" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">read</span><span class="crayon-i" style="font-weight: inherit !important;">u</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-28" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Specify password that you want the server to use:"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-29" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">read</span><span class="crayon-v" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #002d7a !important;">p</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-30" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-31" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-c" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ff8000 !important;"># get the VPS IP</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-32" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-v" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #002d7a !important;">ip</span><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">=</span><span class="crayon-sy" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #333333 !important;">`</span><span class="crayon-e" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #004ed0 !important;">ifconfig </span><span class="crayon-v" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #002d7a !important;">venet0</span><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">:</span><span class="crayon-cn" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #ce0000 !important;">0</span><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">|</span><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">grep</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">'inet addr'</span><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">|</span><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">awk</span><span class="crayon-sy" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #333333 !important;">{</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">'print $2'</span><span class="crayon-sy" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #333333 !important;">}</span><span class="crayon-o" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #006fe0 !important;">|</span><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">sed</span><span class="crayon-v" style="font-weight: inherit !important; <div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-81" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"######################################################"</span></div>

<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-128" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"######################################################"</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-129" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-130" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-st" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">else</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-131" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">echo</span><span class="crayon-s" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #008000 !important;">"Invalid selection, quitting."</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-132" class="crayon-line crayon-striped-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-r" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">exit</span></div>
<div id="crayon-55bf0e86336b0678324988-133" class="crayon-line" style="font-weight: inherit !important;"><span class="crayon-st" style="font-weight: inherit !important; color: #800080 !important;">fi</span></div>
</div></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</div>
&nbsp;

</div>
<div style="color: #555555;">############################完#############################</div>
<div style="color: #555555;">如果一件安装包都不知道用，那就真的没法子了</div>
<div style="color: #555555;">

<strong>FAQ：</strong>

1.报错：重启时候提示

# service pptpd restart
Shutting down pptpd: [失败]
Starting pptpd: [失败]
Warning: a pptpd restart does not terminate existing
connections, so new connections may be assigned the same IP
address and cause unexpected results. Use restart-kill to
destroy existing connections during a restart.

<span style="color: #ff0000;">解决办法：</span>根据提示，可能是你重启pptpd服务的时候，没有切断已经存在的连接，所以新的连接会被分配为相同的ip地址，导致一些不可预料的问题。所以你重启 pptpd服务前，先用下面的命令断开当前存在的连接：#service pptpd restart-kill，然后再#service pptpd start

2.有的vps不支持加密连接，导致不能拨号成功登陆vpn。
<p style="color: #444444;">解决办法：是<span class="entry">编辑/etc/ppp/options.pptpd（vim /etc/ppp/options.pptpd），在require-mppe-128前面加个#（# require-mppe-128）；</span></p>
<p style="color: #444444;"><span class="entry">在windows的VPN连接属性里，加密方式选择为可选加密，并允许未加密的密码。</span></p>
&nbsp;

3.能够直接用域名作为vpn的拨号地址，而不用vps的ip。因为ip不方便记忆，我自己也记不住自己的服务器的ip。

<span style="color: #ff0000;">解决办法：</span>去dns里面设置，将<span style="color: #ff0000;">域名设置为A记录</span>，这样就可以直接用域名作为vpn的服务器的地址了。

4.有的链接 pptp vpn时候失败，提示619.

解决办法：执行下面的命令：

# rm -r /dev/ppp

# mknod /dev/ppp c 108 0 然后重启VPS即可。

也可以参考这片文章《<a style="color: #428bca;" title="" href="http://www.hkcdn.net/23.html" data-original-title="">VPN连接时提示619错误处理办法及vpn连接成功后无法上网解决办法</a>》

</div>]]></content:encoded>
