	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">            </span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'unread'</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=&gt;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">4</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="com" style="color: #880000;">//未读消息数量</span></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">            </span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'untask'</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=&gt;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">3</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="com" style="color: #880000;">//未完成任务</span></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">        </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">),</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span></li>
	<li class="L1"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">        </span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'info'</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=&gt;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'Here is the message which, commonly used in popup window'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="com" style="color: #880000;">//消息提示，客户端常会用此作为给弹窗信息。</span></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">        </span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'code'</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=&gt;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">200</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="com" style="color: #880000;">//成功与失败的代码，一般都是正数或者负数</span></li>
	<li class="L3"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">    </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">);</span></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">    </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">exit</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">json_encode</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">$output</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">));</span></li>
	<li class="L5"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> elseif </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">$a </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">==</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'get_games_result'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">)</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">{</span></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">    </span><span class="com" style="color: #880000;">//...</span></li>
	<li class="L7"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">    </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">die</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'您正在调 get_games_result 接口!'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">);</span></li>
	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> elseif </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">$a </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">==</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'upload_avatars'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">)</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">{</span></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">    </span><span class="com" style="color: #880000;">//....</span></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">    </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">die</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'您正在调 upload_avatars 接口!'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">);</span></li>
	<li class="L1"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span></li>
</ol>
<div class="think-copy" style="color: #000000;">复制代码</div>
<div id="zclip-ZeroClipboardMovie_1" class="zclip" style="color: #000000;"></div>
<span style="color: #323232;">点击测试（对于客户端而言，也是直接调用这样的地址）：</span><br style="color: #323232;" /><a style="color: #72b939;" href="http://www.ezhi.net/api/test/index.php" target="_blank">http://www.ezhi.net/api/test/index.php</a><br style="color: #323232;" /><a style="color: #72b939;" href="http://www.ezhi.net/api/test/index.php?a=get_users" target="_blank">http://www.ezhi.net/api/test/index.php?a=get_users</a><br style="color: #323232;" /><a style="color: #72b939;" href="http://www.ezhi.net/api/test/index.php?a=get_users&amp;uid=10001" target="_blank">http://www.ezhi.net/api/test/index.php?a=get_users&amp;uid=10001</a><br style="color: #323232;" /><a style="color: #72b939;" href="http://www.ezhi.net/api/test/index.php?a=get_users&amp;uid=10002" target="_blank">http://www.ezhi.net/api/test/index.php?a=get_users&amp;uid=10002</a><br style="color: #323232;" /><a style="color: #72b939;" href="http://www.ezhi.net/api/test/index.php?a=get_users&amp;uid=10003" target="_blank">http://www.ezhi.net/api/test/index.php?a=get_users&amp;uid=10003</a><br style="color: #323232;" /><br style="color: #323232;" /><span style="color: #323232;">三、实际项目中，我们在开发 API 应该注意的几个事项（仅供参考）：</span><br style="color: #323232;" /><span style="color: #323232;">1、单文件实现多接口的形式有很多种，例如：if..elseif.. 或 switch 或 动态方法 (也就是TP的这种访问函数体的形式)</span><br style="color: #323232;" /><span style="color: #323232;">2、对于数据的输出最好用json，json具有相当强大的跨平台性，市场上各大主流编程语言都支持json解析，json正在逐步取代xml，成为网络数据的通用格式</span><br style="color: #323232;" /><span style="color: #323232;">3、接口安全，一定要增加接口验证。例如，客户端和服务端针对不同接口统一做好加密方式，服务端在对于每次接口需要都要进行验证。以保证防止接口被恶意刷新或黑客恶意调用，尤其是大型商业应用。</span><br style="color: #323232;" /><span style="color: #323232;">4、对于线上的 API 必须保证所有接口正常且关闭所有的错误信息 =&gt; error_reporting(0)，在输出JSON 时，不能有任何其它输出，否则，客户端将会获取错误的数据信息，98%直接导致客户端 Crash！</span><br style="color: #323232;" /><span style="color: #323232;">5、开发 API 和 WEB 有一定的区别，如果是 WEB 的话，可能代码出错了，不会导致特别严重的错误，也许只是导致数据写入和查询失败，也许导致 WEB 的某个部分错位或乱码。但如果是 API，99%的情况都是客户端直接Crash、闪退！</span><br style="color: #323232;" /><span style="color: #323232;">6、做接口开发，不建议使用框架开发，原因概括起来有两点（其实我有点冒风险的，本人也是 TPer 一枚，毕竟这是TP的官网）：</span><br style="color: #323232;" /><span style="color: #323232;">　　1）客户端一般对服务端的响应速度有极高要求，因此，使用最原生态的 PHP 完成接口开发，是最高效的，假如用到了框架，还需要加载各种不需要多余的文件，就好比夏天穿了件冬天的衣服。试想，你在玩手机的时候，使用一个应用随便一个操作，等半天才有动静，你受的了吗？</span><br style="color: #323232;" /><span style="color: #323232;">　　2）就是上面第4点提到的，框架对于WEB开发，是件很幸福的事，但对于 API 而言，你实在不敢想象它会给你出什么岔子！最后你将痛苦不堪~~因为很多框架都是为 WEB 诞生的（我也很期待有一天能看到专门为开发 API 而生的框架或者扩展）</span><br style="color: #323232;" /><br style="color: #323232;" /><span style="color: #323232;">　　说到这，不得不说扯一下，风靡互联网的开放平台。其实那些开放平台，所谓的开放，就是给你提供一个这样的接口，你根据他们提供的技术文档，按他们制定的格式和要求，调它们提供的接口文件（一般都是返回JSON或者XML），你就可以获取到他们的相关信息，例如：QQ用户基本信息、淘宝店铺、商品消息等等。然后在根据这些消息，在你的应用里完成交互。</span><br style="color: #323232;" /><br style="color: #323232;" /><span style="color: #323232;">　　其实，ajax 也是调用 API 的一种体现形式，你觉得呢？ 呵呵~~</span>]]></content:encoded>

<p class="copyright_p" style="color: #666666;">目录<a style="color: #ca0000;" title="系统根据文章中H1到H6标签自动生成文章目录" href="http://blog.csdn.net/houqd2012/article/details/40949973#">(?)</a><a style="color: #ca0000;" title="展开" href="http://blog.csdn.net/houqd2012/article/details/40949973#">[+]</a></p><!--more-->



</div>
<div style="color: #000000;"></div>
<div id="article_content" class="article_content" style="color: #000000;">
<h3><a style="color: #ca0000;" name="t0"></a>1) WebService技术介绍</h3>
WebService是一种跨编程语言和跨操作系统平台的远程调用技术。只有通过Web Service，客户端和服务器才能够自由的用HTTP进行通信，不论两个程序的平台和变成语言是什么。

XML、SOAP和WSDL是Web Service平台的三大技术：

WebService采用HTTP协议传输数据，采用XML格式封装数据，即XML中说明调用远程服务对象的哪个方法、传递的参数是什么、以及服务对象的返回结果是什么。XML是WebService平台中表示数据的格式，除了易于建立和易于分析外，XML主要的有点在于它既是平台无关的，又是厂商无关的。

SOAP，WebService通过HTTP协议发送请求和接收结果时，发送的请求内容和结果内容都采用XML格式封装，并增加了一些特定的HTTP消息头，以说明HTTP消息的内容格式，这些特定的HTTP消息头和XML内容格式就是SOAP协议，SOAP提供了标准的RPC方法来调用Web Service。SOAP协议 = HTTP协议 + XML数据格式。

WSDL（Web Service Description Language）是基于XML的语言，用于描述Web Service及其函数、参数和返回值，它是WebService客户端和服务器端都能理解的标准格式。因为是基于XML的，所以WSDL及时机器可阅读的，又是人可阅读的。WSDL文件保存在Web服务器上，通过一个url地址就可以访问到它。客户端要调用一个WebService服务之前，要知道该服务的WSDL文件的地址。WebService服务提供商可以通过两种方式来暴露它的WSDL文件地址：1、注册到UUID服务器，以便被人查找；2、直接告诉给客户端调用者。
<h3><a style="color: #ca0000;" name="t1"></a>2) Apache相关配置</h3>
为了能够实现Web Service，httpd必须支持soap的扩展，这里以yum安装httpd及soap扩展为例进行说明：

1&gt; 安装httpd

yum install httpd

2&gt; 安装php

yum install php

3&gt; 配置httpd支持php解析

在/etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf中添加如下：

AddType application/x-httpd-php .php

AddType application/x-httpd-php-source .phps

4&gt; 重新启动httpd

service httpd restart

5&gt; 检查是否安装了soap扩展

/usr/bin/php -m | grep soap  //! 如果存在则说明已经安装了soap扩展，如果不存在，执行下一步

6&gt; 安装soap扩展

yum install php-soap //! 安装完之后再次检查，重启httpd

7&gt; 验证soap扩展是否正确安装

既可以通过php -m | grep soap的方式，也可以通过phpinfo()；的方式。
<h3><a style="color: #ca0000;" name="t2"></a>3) PHP实现WebService服务端</h3>
1&gt; 定义服务类——Service.php

该服务端就是实现你想要对外提供的接口，假设我们需要对外提供一个函数，它接收一个字符串，然后返回”Hello ” + 输入的字符串这个小功能，服务类很简单，如下所示：
<div class="dp-highlighter bg_plain">
<div class="bar">
<div class="tools" style="color: silver;"><b>[plain]</b> <a class="ViewSource" style="color: #a0a0a0;" title="view plain" href="http://blog.csdn.net/houqd2012/article/details/40949973#">view plain</a><a class="CopyToClipboard" style="color: #a0a0a0;" title="copy" href="http://blog.csdn.net/houqd2012/article/details/40949973#">copy</a><a style="color: #a0a0a0;" title="在CODE上查看代码片" href="https://code.csdn.net/snippets/513211" target="_blank"><img src="https://code.csdn.net/assets/CODE_ico.png" alt="在CODE上查看代码片" width="12" height="12" /></a><a style="color: #a0a0a0;" title="派生到我的代码片" href="https://code.csdn.net/snippets/513211/fork" target="_blank"><img src="https://code.csdn.net/assets/ico_fork.svg" alt="派生到我的代码片" width="12" height="12" /></a>
<div></div>
</div>
</div>
<ol style="color: #5c5c5c;" start="1">
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">&lt;?php  </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">   class Service  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">   {  </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">        public function sayHello($content)  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">        {  </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">              return "Hello ".$content;  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">        }  </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">   }  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">?&gt;  </span></li>
</ol>
</div>
2&gt; 生成wsdl文件——create_wsdl.php

为了生成wsdl文件，我们可以使用网上提供的SoapDiscovery.class.php中的getWSDL提供的方法来实现，该SoapDiscovery.class.php的代码在网上可以下载到，为了生成文件，我们需要修改getWSDL方法中的部分代码（加上写文件的代码），如下所示：
<div class="dp-highlighter bg_php">
<div class="bar">
<div class="tools" style="color: silver;"><b>[php]</b> <a class="ViewSource" style="color: #a0a0a0;" title="view plain" href="http://blog.csdn.net/houqd2012/article/details/40949973#">view plain</a><a class="CopyToClipboard" style="color: #a0a0a0;" title="copy" href="http://blog.csdn.net/houqd2012/article/details/40949973#">copy</a><a style="color: #a0a0a0;" title="在CODE上查看代码片" href="https://code.csdn.net/snippets/513211" target="_blank"><img src="https://code.csdn.net/assets/CODE_ico.png" alt="在CODE上查看代码片" width="12" height="12" /></a><a style="color: #a0a0a0;" title="派生到我的代码片" href="https://code.csdn.net/snippets/513211/fork" target="_blank"><img src="https://code.csdn.net/assets/ico_fork.svg" alt="派生到我的代码片" width="12" height="12" /></a>
<div></div>
</div>
</div>
<ol class="dp-c" style="color: #5c5c5c;" start="1">
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//return sprintf('%s%s%s%s%s%s', $headerWSDL, $portTypeWSDL, $bindingWSDL, $serviceWSDL, $messageWSDL, '&lt;/definitions&gt;');</span>  </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">              </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//!注释掉return，添加如下代码，目的是为了调用getWSDL生成.wsdl文件</span>  </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">            <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$fso</span> = <span class="func">fopen</span>(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$this</span>-&gt;class_name.<span class="string" style="color: blue;">".wsdl"</span>, <span class="string" style="color: blue;">"w"</span>);  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            fwrite(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$fso</span>, sprintf(<span class="string" style="color: blue;">'%s%s%s%s%s%s'</span>, <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$headerWSDL</span>, <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$portTypeWSDL</span>, <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$bindingWSDL</span>, <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$serviceWSDL</span>, <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$messageWSDL</span>, <span class="string" style="color: blue;">'&lt;/definitions&gt;'</span>));  </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">                        fclose(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$fso</span>);  </span></li>
</ol>
</div>
现在我们就可以定义自己的create_wsdl.php了，只需要调用一下这个方法即可，如下：
<div class="dp-highlighter bg_php">
<div class="bar">
<div class="tools" style="color: silver;"><b>[php]</b> <a class="ViewSource" style="color: #a0a0a0;" title="view plain" href="http://blog.csdn.net/houqd2012/article/details/40949973#">view plain</a><a class="CopyToClipboard" style="color: #a0a0a0;" title="copy" href="http://blog.csdn.net/houqd2012/article/details/40949973#">copy</a><a style="color: #a0a0a0;" title="在CODE上查看代码片" href="https://code.csdn.net/snippets/513211" target="_blank"><img src="https://code.csdn.net/assets/CODE_ico.png" alt="在CODE上查看代码片" width="12" height="12" /></a><a style="color: #a0a0a0;" title="派生到我的代码片" href="https://code.csdn.net/snippets/513211/fork" target="_blank"><img src="https://code.csdn.net/assets/ico_fork.svg" alt="派生到我的代码片" width="12" height="12" /></a>
<div></div>
</div>
</div>
<ol class="dp-c" style="color: #5c5c5c;" start="1">
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">&lt;?php   </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">    <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: #006699;">include</span>(<span class="string" style="color: blue;">"Service.php"</span>);  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: #006699;">include</span>(<span class="string" style="color: blue;">"SoapDiscovery.class.php"</span>);   </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">    <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//! 第一个参数是类名，生成的wsdl文件就是以它来命名的；第二个参数是服务的名称，可以随便写</span>  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$disco</span> = <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: #006699;">new</span> SoapDiscovery(<span class="string" style="color: blue;">'Service'</span>, <span class="string" style="color: blue;">'soap'</span>);  </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">    <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$disco</span>-&gt;getWSDL();  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">?&gt;  </span></li>
</ol>
</div>
3&gt; 修改服务端——Service.php

修改Service.php，添加一些代码，如下所示：
<div class="dp-highlighter bg_php">

<div></div>
</div>
</div>
<ol class="dp-c" style="color: #5c5c5c;" start="1">
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">&lt;?php  </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">   <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: #006699;">class</span> Service  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">   {  </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">        <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: #006699;">public</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: #006699;">function</span> sayHello(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$content</span>)  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">        {  </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">              <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: #006699;">return</span> <span class="string" style="color: blue;">"Hello "</span>.<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$content</span>;  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">        }  </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">   }  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">    </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">   <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$service</span> = <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: #006699;">new</span> SoapServer(<span class="string" style="color: blue;">'http://192.168.17.129/soap/Service.wsdl'</span>, <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: #006699;">array</span>(<span class="string" style="color: blue;">'soap_version'</span> =&gt; SOAP_1_2));  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">   <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$service</span>-&gt;setClass(<span class="string" style="color: blue;">"Service"</span>); <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//! 注册Service类的所有方法</span>  </span></li>
	<li><span style="color: black;">   <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$service</span>-&gt;handle(); <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//! 处理请求</span>  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">?&gt;  </span></li>
</ol>
</div>

				<title>[转]安卓服务端开发（1） 安卓结合PHP实现连接数据库验证登录功能（附全部代码）</title>
		<link>http://blog.whatisit.cn/archives/1030</link>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="color: #555555;">啥都不说了，直接上代码。如果看不懂在下面和我留言。</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">先看服务端：使用PHP语言，部署在新浪sae服务器（自带数据库）</p><!--more-->


<p style="color: #555555;">将一下所有php文件放在同一个目录下：</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">1.db.php  封装好的用于连接数据库的类</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>

<div class="dp-highlighter bg_php" style="color: #555555;">
<div class="bar">
<div class="tools" style="color: silver;"><b>[php]</b> <a class="ViewSource" style="color: #0c89cf;" title="view plain" href="http://blog.csdn.net/Davidluo001/article/details/42460167#">view plain</a><a class="CopyToClipboard" style="color: #0c89cf;" title="copy" href="http://blog.csdn.net/Davidluo001/article/details/42460167#">copy</a><a class="PrintSource" style="color: #0c89cf;" title="print" href="http://blog.csdn.net/Davidluo001/article/details/42460167#">print</a><a class="About" style="color: #0c89cf;" title="?" href="http://blog.csdn.net/Davidluo001/article/details/42460167#">?</a>
<div></div>
</div>
</div>
<ol class="dp-c" style="color: #5c5c5c;" start="1">
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">&lt;?php  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">class</span> Db{    </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">static</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">private</span> <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_instance</span>;    </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">static</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">private</span> <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_connectSource</span>;    </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//因为是连接新浪sae服务器所以下面的参数不生效。</span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">/*private $_dbConfig=array(  </span> </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">        'host'=&gt;'127.0.0.1',  </span> </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">        'user'=&gt;'root',  </span> </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">        'password'=&gt;'',  </span> </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">        'database'=&gt;'value'  </span> </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    ); */</span>   </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">private</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">function</span> _construct(){    </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">          </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    }    </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">    </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">static</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">public</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">function</span> getInstance(){    </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//如果没有实例，则创建， 然后返回已创建的实例  </span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">         <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">if</span>(!(self::<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_instance</span> instanceof self)){    </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">          self::<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_instance</span> =<span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">new</span> self();    </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">         }     </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">         <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">return</span> self::<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_instance</span>;    </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    }    </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">public</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">function</span> connect(){    </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">if</span>(!self::<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_connectSource</span>){    </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">           self::<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_connectSource</span>=mysql_connect(SAE_MYSQL_HOST_M.<span class="string" style="color: red;">':'</span>.SAE_MYSQL_PORT,SAE_MYSQL_USER,SAE_MYSQL_PASS);   </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">           <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//self::$_connectSource = @mysql_connect($this-&gt;_dbConfig['host'], $this-&gt;_dbConfig['user'], $this-&gt;_dbConfig['password']); </span>  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">if</span>(!self::<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_connectSource</span>){   </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//如果数据库连接不成功</span>  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//抛出异常,在调用该connnect()函数时，通过try catch 进行捕获</span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">throw</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">new</span> Exception (<span class="string" style="color: red;">'mysql connect error'</span>.mysql_error);  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">       <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//die('mysql connect error'.mysql_error);  </span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    }    </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">     mysql_select_db(SAE_MYSQL_DB,self::<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_connectSource</span>);    </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">     <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//mysql_select_db($this-&gt;_dbConfig['database'], self::$_connectSource);</span>  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">     mysql_query(<span class="string" style="color: red;">"set names UTF8"</span>,self::<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_connectSource</span>);    </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        }    </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">     <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">return</span> self::<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_connectSource</span>;    </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    }    </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">    </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">}    </span></li>
</ol>
</div>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">2.response.php 用于封装通信数据（json或者xml）</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>

<div class="dp-highlighter bg_php" style="color: #555555;">
<div class="bar">
<div class="tools" style="color: silver;"><b>[php]</b> <a class="ViewSource" style="color: #0c89cf;" title="view plain" href="http://blog.csdn.net/Davidluo001/article/details/42460167#">view plain</a><a class="CopyToClipboard" style="color: #0c89cf;" title="copy" href="http://blog.csdn.net/Davidluo001/article/details/42460167#">copy</a><a class="PrintSource" style="color: #0c89cf;" title="print" href="http://blog.csdn.net/Davidluo001/article/details/42460167#">print</a><a class="About" style="color: #0c89cf;" title="?" href="http://blog.csdn.net/Davidluo001/article/details/42460167#">?</a>
<div></div>
</div>
</div>
<ol class="dp-c" style="color: #5c5c5c;" start="1">
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">&lt;?php  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">class</span> Response {  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">const</span> JSON = <span class="string" style="color: red;">"json"</span>;  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">/**</span> </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * 按综合方式输出通信数据</span> </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * @param integer $code 状态码</span> </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * @param string $message 提示信息</span> </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * @param array $data 数据</span> </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * @param string $type 数据类型</span> </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * return string</span> </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    */</span>  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">public</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">static</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">function</span> show(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$code</span>, <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$message</span> = <span class="string" style="color: red;">''</span>, <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$data</span> = <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">array</span>(), <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$type</span> = self::JSON) {  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">if</span>(!<span class="func">is_numeric</span>(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$code</span>)) {  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">return</span> <span class="string" style="color: red;">''</span>;  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        }  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$type</span> = isset(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_GET</span>[<span class="string" style="color: red;">'format'</span>]) ? <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_GET</span>[<span class="string" style="color: red;">'format'</span>] : self::JSON;  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$result</span> = <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">array</span>(  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="string" style="color: red;">'code'</span> =&gt; <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$code</span>,  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="string" style="color: red;">'message'</span> =&gt; <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$message</span>,  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="string" style="color: red;">'data'</span> =&gt; <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$data</span>,  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        );  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">if</span>(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$type</span> == <span class="string" style="color: red;">'json'</span>) {  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            self::json(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$code</span>, <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$message</span>, <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$data</span>);  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="func">exit</span>;  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">        } <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">elseif</span>(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$type</span> == <span class="string" style="color: red;">'array'</span>) {  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">            var_dump(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$result</span>);  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">        } <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">elseif</span>(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$type</span> == <span class="string" style="color: red;">'xml'</span>) {  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">            self::xmlEncode(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$code</span>, <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$message</span>, <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$data</span>);  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="func">exit</span>;  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        } <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">else</span> {  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">// TODO</span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        }  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">    }  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">      </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">/**</span> </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * 按json方式输出通信数据</span> </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * @param integer $code 状态码</span> </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * @param string $message 提示信息</span> </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * @param array $data 数据</span> </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * return string</span> </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    */</span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">public</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">static</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">function</span> json(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$code</span>, <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$message</span> = <span class="string" style="color: red;">''</span>, <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$data</span> = <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">array</span>()) {  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">          </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">if</span>(!<span class="func">is_numeric</span>(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$code</span>)) {  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">return</span> <span class="string" style="color: red;">''</span>;  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        }  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$result</span> = <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">array</span>(  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="string" style="color: red;">'code'</span> =&gt; <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$code</span>,  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="string" style="color: red;">'message'</span> =&gt; <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$message</span>,  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="string" style="color: red;">'data'</span> =&gt; <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$data</span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        );  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="func">echo</span> json_encode(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$result</span>);  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="func">exit</span>;  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    }  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">/**</span> </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * 按xml方式输出通信数据</span> </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * @param integer $code 状态码</span> </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * @param string $message 提示信息</span> </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * @param array $data 数据</span> </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    * return string</span> </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">    */</span>  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">public</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">static</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">function</span> xmlEncode(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$code</span>, <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$message</span>, <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$data</span> = <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">array</span>()) {  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">if</span>(!<span class="func">is_numeric</span>(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$code</span>)) {  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">return</span> <span class="string" style="color: red;">''</span>;  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        }  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$result</span> = <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">array</span>(  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="string" style="color: red;">'code'</span> =&gt; <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$code</span>,  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="string" style="color: red;">'message'</span> =&gt; <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$message</span>,  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="string" style="color: red;">'data'</span> =&gt; <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$data</span>,  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        );  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//header("Content-Type:text/xml");</span>  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$xml</span> = <span class="string" style="color: red;">"&lt;?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?&gt;\n"</span>;  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$xml</span> .= <span class="string" style="color: red;">"&lt;root&gt;\n"</span>;  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$xml</span> .= self::xmlToEncode(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$result</span>);  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$xml</span> .= <span class="string" style="color: red;">"&lt;/root&gt;"</span>;  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="func">echo</span> <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$xml</span>;  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    }  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">public</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">static</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">function</span> xmlToEncode(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$data</span>) {  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$xml</span> = <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$attr</span> = <span class="string" style="color: red;">""</span>;  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">foreach</span>(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$data</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">as</span> <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$key</span> =&gt; <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$value</span>) {  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">if</span>(<span class="func">is_numeric</span>(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$key</span>)) {  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$attr</span> = <span class="string" style="color: red;">" id='{$key}'"</span>;  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$key</span> = <span class="string" style="color: red;">"item"</span>;  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            }  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$xml</span> .= <span class="string" style="color: red;">"&lt;{$key}{$attr}&gt;"</span>;  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$xml</span> .= <span class="func">is_array</span>(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$value</span>) ? self::xmlToEncode(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$value</span>) : <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$value</span>;  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$xml</span> .= <span class="string" style="color: red;">"&lt;/{$key}&gt;\n"</span>;  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">        }  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">return</span> <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$xml</span>;  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">    }  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">}  </span></li>
</ol>
</div>
<br style="color: #555555;" /><br style="color: #555555;" />
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">
3.checklogin.php 提供给客户端 ，让客户端使用GET请求，传入username,passwd 验证登录</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>

<div class="dp-highlighter bg_php" style="color: #555555;">
<div class="bar">
<div class="tools" style="color: silver;"><b>[php]</b> <a class="ViewSource" style="color: #0c89cf;" title="view plain" href="http://blog.csdn.net/Davidluo001/article/details/42460167#">view plain</a><a class="CopyToClipboard" style="color: #0c89cf;" title="copy" href="http://blog.csdn.net/Davidluo001/article/details/42460167#">copy</a><a class="PrintSource" style="color: #0c89cf;" title="print" href="http://blog.csdn.net/Davidluo001/article/details/42460167#">print</a><a class="About" style="color: #0c89cf;" title="?" href="http://blog.csdn.net/Davidluo001/article/details/42460167#">?</a>
<div></div>
</div>
</div>
<ol class="dp-c" style="color: #5c5c5c;" start="1">
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">&lt;?php  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//这是app验证登录接口</span>  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//访问方式http://****.com/bee/checklogin.php </span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">if</span>(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_GET</span>[<span class="string" style="color: red;">'format'</span>]==<span class="string" style="color: red;">'xml'</span>){  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">header(<span class="string" style="color: red;">"Content-Type:text/xml"</span>);}  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">require_once</span>(<span class="string" style="color: red;">'./response.php'</span>);<span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//引入数据封装类</span>  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">require_once</span>(<span class="string" style="color: red;">'./db.php'</span>);<span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//引入数据库类</span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$username</span>=<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_GET</span>[<span class="string" style="color: red;">'username'</span>];    </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$passwd</span>=<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$_GET</span>[<span class="string" style="color: red;">'passwd'</span>];    </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$sql</span> = <span class="string" style="color: red;">"select * from user where `username`='$username' and `passwd`='$passwd'"</span>;    </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">try{  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$connect</span>=Db::getInstance()-&gt;connect();   </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">}catch(Exception <span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$e</span>){  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    Response::show(403,<span class="string" style="color: red;">'数据库连接失败'</span>);   </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">}  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$result</span>=mysql_query(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$sql</span>,<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$connect</span>);  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$videos</span>=<span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">array</span>();  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//mysql_fetch_assoc()字段名key植是value,方便客户端解析。每行获取,区别与mysql_fetch_array()</span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">while</span>(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$video</span>=mysql_fetch_assoc(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$result</span>)){  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$videos</span>[]=<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$video</span>;  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">}  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//这样就从数据库中获取了数据存到了$videos[]中，接着需要转换成接口数据</span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">if</span>(<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$videos</span>){  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">Response::show(200,<span class="string" style="color: red;">'首页数据获取成功'</span>,<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$videos</span>);  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//这样默认生成了json数据，如果需要xml数据，需要在访问时http://...com/list.php?format=xml</span>  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">}<span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">else</span>{  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">Response::show(400,<span class="string" style="color: red;">'首页数据获取失败'</span>,<span class="vars" style="color: #dd0000;">$videos</span>);  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">}  </span></li>
</ol>
</div>
<br style="color: #555555;" /><br style="color: #555555;" />
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">到这里服务端代码已经完成，接受客户端的hhtp get请求，通过查询数据库，验证用户名，密码是否正确。将结果封装成json或者xml，输出在浏览器中。供客户端读取。</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">下面是安卓客户端部分代码：</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">布局文件就不展示了，就是两个textview 和两个edittext,还有一个Button</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">直接上MainActivity.java</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>

	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                                 realname=secondobject.getString(<span class="string" style="color: red;">"realname"</span>);  </span></li>

	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                            }  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                            Message m1=myhandler.obtainMessage();  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                            <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">if</span>(code==<span class="number" style="color: #c00000;">400</span>)<span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//登录失败</span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                            {  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                                m1.what=<span class="number" style="color: #c00000;">1</span>;  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                                myhandler.sendMessage(m1);  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                            }<span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">else</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">if</span>(code==<span class="number" style="color: #c00000;">200</span>){<span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//登录成功</span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                                m1.what=<span class="number" style="color: #c00000;">2</span>;  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                                myhandler.sendMessage(m1);  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                            }<span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">else</span>{<span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">//其他情况：联网失败，服务器异常等</span>  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                                m1.what=<span class="number" style="color: #c00000;">3</span>;  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                                myhandler.sendMessage(m1);  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                            }  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                              </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                        } <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">catch</span> (MalformedURLException e) {  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                            <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">// TODO Auto-generated catch block</span>  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                            e.printStackTrace();  </span></li>

	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                            <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">// TODO Auto-generated catch block</span>  </span></li>

	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                    }  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                });  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                t.start();  </span></li>

	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        });   </span></li>

	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;"><span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">        });*/</span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">        myhandler=<span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">new</span> Handler(){  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="annotation" style="color: #646464;">@Override</span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">            <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">public</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">void</span> handleMessage(Message msg) {  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">// TODO Auto-generated method stub</span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">super</span>.handleMessage(msg);  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">if</span>(msg.what==<span class="number" style="color: #c00000;">1</span>){  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                Toast.makeText(Login.<span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">this</span>, <span class="string" style="color: red;">"用户名或密码不正确"</span>, <span class="number" style="color: #c00000;">0</span>).show();  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                } <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">else</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">if</span>(msg.what==<span class="number" style="color: #c00000;">2</span>){  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                    Toast.makeText(Login.<span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">this</span>, <span class="string" style="color: red;">"欢迎您："</span>+realname, <span class="number" style="color: #c00000;">0</span>).show();  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                    <span class="comment" style="color: #008200;">/*登陆成功将数据写到本地保存下来，以便下次自动额登陆*/</span>  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                    sp=getSharedPreferences(<span class="string" style="color: red;">"login"</span>, MODE_PRIVATE);  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                    Editor editor=sp.edit();  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                    editor.putString(<span class="string" style="color: red;">"username"</span>, user);  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                    editor.putString(<span class="string" style="color: red;">"passwd"</span>, passwd);  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                    editor.putString(<span class="string" style="color: red;">"realname"</span>, realname);  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                    editor.commit();  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                    Intent i = <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">new</span> Intent(Login.<span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">this</span>, MainActivity.<span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">class</span>);  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                    startActivity(i);  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                    finish();  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                } <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">else</span> {  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">                    Toast.makeText(Login.<span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold; color: blue;">this</span>, <span class="string" style="color: red;">"网络连接失败"</span>, <span class="number" style="color: #c00000;">0</span>).show();  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">                }  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">            }  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">        };  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">         </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">          </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">    }  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li style="color: #555555;"><span style="color: black;">  </span></li>
	<li class="alt" style="color: inherit;"><span style="color: black;">}  </span></li>
</ol>
</div>
<br style="color: #555555;" /><br style="color: #555555;" /><span style="color: #555555;">如果对上面的sharedpreference 不了解请，到这里看一下：</span>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><a style="color: #0c89cf;" href="http://blog.csdn.net/davidluo001/article/details/42290369" target="_blank">http://blog.csdn.net/davidluo001/article/details/42290369</a></p>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>%e8%bd%ac%e5%ae%89%e5%8d%93%e6%9c%8d%e5%8a%a1%e7%ab%af%e5%bc%80%e5%8f%91%ef%bc%881%ef%bc%89-%e5%ae%89%e5%8d%93%e7%bb%93%e5%90%88php%e5%ae%9e%e7%8e%b0%e8%bf%9e%e6%8e%a5%e6%95%b0%e6%8d%ae%e5%ba%93</wp:post_name>

	<item>
				<title>[转]16个最佳响应式HTML5框架分享</title>
		<link>http://blog.whatisit.cn/archives/1035</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 08 Dec 2015 02:20:22 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[tydqq]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.whatisit.cn/?p=1035</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="color: #000000;"><img title="16个最佳响应式HTML5框架分享" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJWxhsXqGibM8p3JZFSocfvmcYH15kBV4JbS3b1qb7IXNC2U3RncXnKrHQ/0" alt="16个最佳响应式HTML5框架分享" /><!--more-->

</p>
<p style="color: #000000;">HTML5框架可以快速构建响应式网站，它们帮助程序员减少编码工作，减少冗余的代码。如今有很多免费的HTML5框架可供使用，由于它们有着响应式设计、跨浏览器兼容、相对轻量级等特点，这些框架在开发中都十分流行。如果你也对HTML5框架感兴趣，你可以看看下面我列出的一些最佳的响应式HTML5框架，帮助你快速开发网站。</p>

<h2 style="color: #000000;">1. Twitter Bootstrap</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031479" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJWOvZoXVeice6pL3t88ae8DHUDwiaMBNu9Pwtmnj6qk2CGibhCd1ic5etwMw/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.38537549407114624" data-w="" /></p>
Bootstrap来自Twitter，是目前最受欢迎的前端框架，它简洁灵活，使得Web开发更加方便快捷。它有着优雅的HTMCSS规范，以及构建响应式网站的基本的组件，例如12列栅格布局、jQuery插件、Bootstrap控件等等。
<h2 style="color: #000000;">2. HTML5 Boilerplate</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031480" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJWalWr8ETQfhP76FDVGJdJRqEq3zEvJwziaYU8Nvsx63HQAgHz6U2CQkg/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.39920948616600793" data-w="" /></p>
HTML5 Boilerplate的核心是用于帮助开发HTML5站点和应用程序的组件，它有着出色的性能和独立性，帮助你开始一个新的项目。
<h2 style="color: #000000;">3. Foundation</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031481" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJW0JO2ibS4eJRML4Z81cSwyFa1bb0bxMwg5qS60JSiaeIdekSfmJq2zajQ/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.383399209486166" data-w="" /></p>
Foundation一款非常先进的前端框架，易用、强大而且灵活，可用于构建基于任何设备上的 Web应用，提供多种Web上的UI组件，如表单、按钮、Tabs 等等。
<h2 style="color: #000000;">4. Ulkit</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031482" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJW57Ts6z2r2Ooy6NCbqxtTw6296QibgniaXG9ZD1MAZLjpRAKKro7JgLfw/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.6284584980237155" data-w="" /></p>
Ulkit是一个轻量级、模块化的前端框架，帮助开发出快速、强大的Web接口，它有着全面的HTML、CSS和JS集合，易于使用和扩展。
<h2 style="color: #000000;">5. HTML5 KickStart</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031483" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJWhOkrDww5LetzpJ00yJGOibfBk9B4h2ia2k0YHbu6W1x7BjkGD4hudxFA/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.3814229249011858" data-w="" /></p>
HTML5 KickStart集合了HTML5、CSS和JS，帮助开发人员快速开发Web产品，它覆盖了所有的UI组件，同时也包含一些有用的JS插件。
<h2 style="color: #000000;">6. Gumby</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031484" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJW28jmBfarDeEqgMJQ1PgglTkk8dnTdQDRtddATRDBaxecKS5z4yukhA/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.6482213438735178" data-w="" /></p>
Gumby 2基于Sass开发，是一款出色的响应式CSS框架，它包括一个Web UI工具包，有好看按钮，表格，导航、标签、JS插件等。
<h2 style="color: #000000;">7. Skeleton</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031485" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJWc87pibOGKhMKaDyfwWUxib29BG2Z8F1hazZW08XvY7V8fzeR8ZwpvpBw/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.5177865612648221" data-w="" /></p>
Skeleton有着简单、界面友好的特点，有一系列CSS和JS文件的集合，它可以帮你快速地调整网页在不同分辨率下的显示效果，可以优雅地等比例缩放桌面、平板、手机上的浏览尺寸。
<h2 style="color: #000000;">8. Groundwork</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031486" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJWUkQ7a9xecw8nPoR2t2Sm1weqxdH7OLWoLlt2gJbNwiaRclIMjVsq8zg/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.5079051383399209" data-w="" /></p>
Groundwork是一个响应式的HTML5，CSS和JavaScript框架，是基于Sass预处理器的开源项目。Groundwork 提供多种UI组件，如导航、按钮、图标、表单、Tabs、对话框、工具提示等等，可以创建适应多种浏览设备的布局。
<h2 style="color: #000000;">9. Base</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031487" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJWYqv3ZFwr22WJVYJaib5OFuFiacLd9qw0lAMq5RvpRKHKw1r4odSoJ5kA/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.5118577075098815" data-w="" /></p>
Base是一款系统化的、轻量级且易于扩展的框架，帮助你创建更强大的响应式网站。
<h2 style="color: #000000;">10. Montage</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031488" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJWpx2EbVN481WQDAl8GQ326q42qofucWhJtbJn8dnnR95WN1PVhs0iamQ/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.4150197628458498" data-w="" /></p>
Montage用于创建现代的Web应用，可以在客户端建立丰富的用户界面，并使用面向服务的后端处理数据。它有着出色的特性，例如复用组件和HTML模板，使用声明式的组件模型和声明式的数据绑定等等。
<h2 style="color: #000000;">11. Layers CSS</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031489" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJW1SEvsCU6iaH3rHQ1vf2uGib8at7ytm2oibUEn2f1r6ibSnj9icTRU7beLJw/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.5118577075098815" data-w="" /></p>
Layers CSS是一款轻量级的CSS框架，它集中处理了主要的样式结构，支持响应式布局。
<h2 style="color: #000000;">12. 52Framework</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031490" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJW3MD5SFdS6KmNJcKXnMKmYSnedFfdtFRhlorwlsBicsL8asPg2Dr8Kicg/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.4090909090909091" data-w="" /></p>
52Framework是一个Web开发框架，它能实现HTML5和CSS3。它是一个跨浏览器的框架，可以在所有主流的浏览器上运行。它集合了很多优秀的组件，比如HTML5视频播放器、HTML5 canvas、HTML5认证表单等。
<h2 style="color: #000000;">13. CreateJS</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031491" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJWIOsN8pP29HkpflZc8fU2aTichpQEaCkeUB01ibSnsQ3V51AZdcTJwz7A/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.43280632411067194" data-w="" /></p>
CreateJS是一套模块库和工具，丰富了网站的交互性内容。它有着对象管理、tweening等特征。套件包括EaselJs, TweenJS, SoundJS, PreloadJS 和Zoe。
<h2 style="color: #000000;">14. Kube</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031492" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJWiaEGDytSj1nvXIz1wvAdo86QYdLB94kYuWBXGnOS2atasnwMDkNmo5w/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.5474308300395256" data-w="" /></p>
Kube足够的简单，足够小，具有很强的自适应能力，是响应式的 CSS 框架。它拥有最新最炫的网格和漂亮的字体排版，没有任何样式绑定，给用户以绝对的自由。
<h2 style="color: #000000;">15. Less Framework</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031493" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJWXD2ibpnY1fQicTjMeVqGkz4DkjiarK0fYWphkIympe9LOTTVk7f4w211A/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.4525691699604743" data-w="" /></p>
Less Framework是一个现代的前端框架。它是一个CSS网格系统，用来设计自适应网页，包括4个布局和3套字体预设置，所有都是基于单个网格的。
<h2 style="color: #000000;">16. SkelJS</h2>
<p style="color: #000000;"><img id="c1426656031494" src="http://img01.store.sogou.com/net/a/04/link?appid=100520031&amp;w=710&amp;url=http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz/0QORYIYq51lgR7sAJI3Rj8ib65XwZONJWCI0negEHYY7bNvJTf7pxM5nX03tegia18KUkxjDcT4uq5vUPqeSHic9g/0" alt="" data-type="jpeg" data-ratio="0.691699604743083" data-w="" /></p>
Skel.js是一个用于创建响应式站点和应用的轻量级前端框架。]]></content:encoded>
