	<item>
				<title>手机网站的几点注意</title>
		<link>http://blog.whatisit.cn/archives/1038</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 09 Dec 2015 06:57:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[tydqq]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.whatisit.cn/?p=1038</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="color: #444444;">对于手机网站建设，总结了如下几点注意：</p>

<h2 style="color: #444444;">1、 安卓浏览器看背景图片，有些设备会模糊。</h2>
<p style="color: #444444;">用同等比例的图片在PC机上很清楚，但是手机上很模糊，原因是什么呢？</p><!--more-->


<p style="color: #444444;">经过研究，是devicePixelRatio作怪，因为手机分辨率太小，如果按照分辨率来显示网页，这样字会非常小，所以苹果当初就把iPhone 4的960640分辨率，在网页里只显示了480320，这样devicePixelRatio＝2。现在android比较乱，有1.5的，有2的也有3的。</p>
<p style="color: #444444;">想让图片在手机里显示更为清晰，必须使用2x的背景图来代替img标签（一般情况都是用2倍）。例如一个div的宽高是100100，背景图必须得200200，然后background-size:contain;，这样显示出来的图片就比较清晰了。</p>
<p style="color: #444444;">代码可以如下：</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">    background</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">url</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(../</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">images</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">/</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">icon</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">/</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">all</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">png</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">)</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">no</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">repeat center center</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">webkit</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">background</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">size</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">50px</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">50px</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">
  background</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">size</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">50px</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">50px</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">display</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">inline</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">block</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> width</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">100</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">%;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> height</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">50px</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">或者指定 background-size:contain;都可以，大家试试！</p>

<h2 style="color: #444444;">2、图片加载</h2>
<p style="color: #444444;">若您遇到图片加载很慢的问题，对这种情况，手机开发一般用canvas方法加载：</p>
<p style="color: #444444;">具体的canvas API 参见：<a style="color: #3d658d;" href="http://javascript.ruanyifeng.com/htmlapi/canvas.html" target="_blank">http://javascript.ruanyifeng.com/htmlapi/canvas.html</a></p>
<p style="color: #444444;">下面举例说明一个canvas的例子：</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;li&gt;&lt;canvas&gt;&lt;/canvas&gt;&lt;/li&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">s动态加载图片和li 总共举例17张图片！</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">var</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> total</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">17</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">var</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> zWin</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">$</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">window</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">);</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">var</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> render</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">function</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(){</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">var</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> padding</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">2</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">var</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> winWidth</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">zWin</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">width</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">();</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">var</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> picWidth</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Math</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">floor</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">((</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">winWidth</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">padding</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">*</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">3</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">)/</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">4</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">);</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">var</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> tmpl </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">''</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">for</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">var</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> i</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">1</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">i</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">&lt;=</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">totla</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">i</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">++){</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">var</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> p</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">padding</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">var</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> imgSrc</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'img/'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">+</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">i</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">+</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'.jpg'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">if</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">i</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">%</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">4</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">==</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">1</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">){</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">  
      p</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">  
    tmpl </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">+=</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'&lt;lipun" style="color: #666600;"&gt;+</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">picWidth</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">+</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'px;height:'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">+</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">picWidth</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">+</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'px;padding-left:'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">+</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">p</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">+</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'px;padding-top:'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">+</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">padding</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">+</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'px;"&gt;&lt;canvas id="cvs_'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">+</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">i</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">+</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'"&gt;&lt;/canvas&gt;&lt;/li&gt;'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">var</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> imageObj </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">new</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Image</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">();</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">  
    imageObj</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">index </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> i</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">  
    imageObj</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">onload </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">function</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(){</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">var</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> cvs </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">$</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'#cvs_'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">+</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">this</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">index</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">)[</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">].</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">getContext</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'2d'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">);</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">  
       cvs</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">width </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">this</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">width</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">  
       cvs</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">height</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">this</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">height</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">  
       cvs</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">drawImage</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">this</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">);</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">  
    imageObj</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">src</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">imgSrc</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">  
render</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">();</span></code></pre>
<h2 style="color: #444444;">3、假如手机网站不用兼容IE浏览器，一般我们会使用zeptojs。zeptojs内置Touch events方法，具体可以看<a style="color: #3d658d;" href="http://zeptojs.com/#Touch" target="_blank">http://zeptojs.com/#Touch</a> events</h2>
<p style="color: #444444;">看了一下zeptio新版的API，已经支持IE10以上浏览器，对zeptojs可以选择使用！</p>

<h2 style="color: #444444;">4、防止手机中网页放大和缩小，这点是最基本的，最为手机网站开发者来说应该都知道的，就是设置meta中的viewport</h2>
<p style="color: #444444;">还有就是，有些手机网站我们看到如下声明：</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="dec" style="color: #660066;">&lt;!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//WAPFORUM//DTD XHTML Mobile 1.0//EN" "http://www.wapforum.org/DTD/xhtml-mobile10.dtd"&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">设置了DTD的方式是XHTML的写法，假如我们页面运用的是html5，可以不用设置DTD,直接声明&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;。</p>
<p style="color: #444444;"><strong>使用viewport使页面禁止缩放。 通常把user-scalable设置为0来关闭用户对页面视图缩放的行为。</strong></p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"viewport"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"user-scalable=0"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">/&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">但是为了更好的兼容，我们会使用完整的viewport设置。</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"viewport"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0,maximum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=0"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">/&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">当然，user-scalable=0,有的人也写成user-scalable=no，都可以的。</p>

<h2 style="color: #444444;">5、apple-mobile-web-app-capable</h2>
<p style="color: #444444;">apple-mobile-web-app-capable是设置Web应用是否以全屏模式运行。</p>
<p style="color: #444444;"><strong>语法：</strong></p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-mobile-web-app-capable"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"yes"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;"><strong>说明：</strong></p>
<p style="color: #444444;">如果content设置为yes，Web应用会以全屏模式运行，反之，则不会。content的默认值是no，表示正常显示。你可以通过只读属性window.navigator.standalone来确定网页是否以全屏模式显示。</p>
<p style="color: #444444;"><strong>兼容性：</strong></p>
<p style="color: #444444;">iOS 2.1 +</p>

<h2 style="color: #444444;">6、format-detection</h2>
<p style="color: #444444;">format-detection 启动或禁用自动识别页面中的电话号码。</p>
<p style="color: #444444;"><strong>语法：</strong></p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"format-detection"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"telephone=no"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;"><strong>说明：</strong></p>
<p style="color: #444444;">默认情况下，设备会自动识别任何可能是电话号码的字符串。设置telephone=no可以禁用这项功能。</p>
<p style="color: #444444;"><strong>兼容性</strong></p>
<p style="color: #444444;">iOS 1.0 +</p>

<h2 style="color: #444444;">7、html5调用安卓或者ios的拨号功能</h2>
<p style="color: #444444;">html5提供了自动调用拨号的标签，只要在a标签的href中添加tel:就可以了。</p>
<p style="color: #444444;">如下：</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;a</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">href</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"tel:4008106999,1034"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">400-810-6999 转 1034</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;/a&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">拨打手机直接如下</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;a</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">href</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"tel:15677776767"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">点击拨打15677776767</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;/a&gt;</span></code></pre>
<h2 style="color: #444444;">8、html5GPS定位功能</h2>
<p style="color: #444444;">具体请看：<a style="color: #3d658d;" href="http://www.haorooms.com/post/html5_GPS_getCurrentPosition" target="_blank">http://www.haorooms.com/post/html5_GPS_getCurrentPosition</a></p>

<h2 style="color: #444444;">9、上下拉动滚动条时卡顿、慢</h2>
<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> body </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">{</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">webkit</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">overflow</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">scrolling</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> touch</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">
    overflow</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">scrolling</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> touch</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">Android3+和iOS5+支持CSS3的新属性为overflow-scrolling</p>

<h2 style="color: #444444;">10、禁止复制、选中文本</h2>
<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Element</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">{</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">webkit</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">user</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">select</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> none</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">moz</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">user</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">select</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> none</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">khtml</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">user</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">select</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> none</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">
     user</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">select</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> none</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">解决移动设备可选中页面文本(视产品需要而定)</p>

<h2 style="color: #444444;">11、长时间按住页面出现闪退</h2>
<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">element </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">{</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">webkit</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">touch</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">callout</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> none</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span></code></pre>
<h2 style="color: #444444;">12、iphone及ipad下输入框默认内阴影</h2>
<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Element</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">{</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">webkit</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">appearance</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> none</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span></code></pre>
<h2 style="color: #444444;">13、ios和android下触摸元素时出现半透明灰色遮罩</h2>
<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Element</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">{</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">webkit</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">tap</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">highlight</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">color</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">rgba</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">255</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">255</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">255</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">)</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">设置alpha值为0就可以去除半透明灰色遮罩，备注：transparent的属性值在android下无效。</p>
<p style="color: #444444;">后面一篇文章有详细介绍，地址：<a style="color: #3d658d;" href="http://www.haorooms.com/post/phone_web_ysk" target="_blank">http://www.haorooms.com/post/phone_web_ysk</a></p>

<h2 style="color: #444444;">14、active兼容处理 即 伪类 :active 失效</h2>
<p style="color: #444444;">方法一：body添加ontouchstart</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;body</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">ontouchstart</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">""</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">方法二：js给 document 绑定 touchstart 或 touchend 事件</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;style&gt;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">
a </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">{</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">
  color</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="com" style="color: #880000;">#000;</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">
a</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">active </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">{</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">
  color</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="com" style="color: #880000;">#fff;</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;/style&gt;</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;a</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">herf</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">foo</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">bar</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;/a&gt;</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;script&gt;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">
  document</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">addEventListener</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'touchstart'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">function</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(){},</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">false</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">);</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;/script&gt;</span></code></pre>
<h2 style="color: #444444;">15、动画定义3D启用硬件加速</h2>
<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Element</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">{</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">webkit</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">transform</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">translate3d</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">)</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">
    transform</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> translate3d</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">);</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">注意：3D变形会消耗更多的内存与功耗</p>

<h2 style="color: #444444;">16、Retina屏的1px边框</h2>
<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Element</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">{</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">
    border</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">width</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> thin</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span></code></pre>
<h2 style="color: #444444;">17、webkit mask 兼容处理</h2>
<p style="color: #444444;">某些低端手机不支持css3 mask，可以选择性的降级处理。</p>
<p style="color: #444444;">比如可以使用js判断来引用不同class：</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">if</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'WebkitMask'</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">in</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> document</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">documentElement</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">style</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">){</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">
    alert</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'支持mask'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">);</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">else</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">{</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">
    alert</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'不支持mask'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">);</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span></code></pre>
<h2 style="color: #444444;">18、旋转屏幕时，字体大小调整的问题</h2>
<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">html</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> body</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> form</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> fieldset</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> p</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> div</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> h1</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> h2</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> h3</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> h4</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> h5</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> h6 </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">{</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">webkit</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">text</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">size</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">adjust</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">100</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">%;</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span></code></pre>
<h2 style="color: #444444;">19、transition闪屏</h2>
<p style="color: #444444;">/设置内嵌的元素在 3D 空间如何呈现：保留3D /</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">webkit</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">transform</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">style</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> preserve</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">3d</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">/ 设置进行转换的元素的背面在面对用户时是否可见：隐藏 /</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">webkit</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">backface</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">visibility</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">hidden</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span></code></pre>
<h2 style="color: #444444;">20、圆角bug</h2>
<p style="color: #444444;">某些Android手机圆角失效</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">background</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">clip</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> padding</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">box</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span></code></pre>
<h2 style="color: #444444;">21、顶部状态栏背景色</h2>
<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"black"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">/&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;"><strong>说明：</strong></p>
<p style="color: #444444;">除非你先使用apple-mobile-web-app-capable指定全屏模式，否则这个meta标签不会起任何作用。</p>
<p style="color: #444444;">如果content设置为default，则状态栏正常显示。如果设置为blank，则状态栏会有一个黑色的背景。如果设置为blank-translucent，则状态栏显示为黑色半透明。如果设置为default或blank，则页面显示在状态栏的下方，即状态栏占据上方部分，页面占据下方部分，二者没有遮挡对方或被遮挡。如果设置为blank-translucent，则页面会充满屏幕，其中页面顶部会被状态栏遮盖住（会覆盖页面20px高度，而iphone4和itouch4的Retina屏幕为40px）。默认值是default。</p>
<p style="color: #444444;"><strong>兼容性</strong> iOS 2.1 +</p>

<h2 style="color: #444444;">22、设置缓存</h2>
<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">http-equiv</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"Cache-Control"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"no-cache"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">/&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">手机页面通常在第一次加载后会进行缓存，然后每次刷新会使用缓存而不是去重新向服务器发送请求。如果不希望使用缓存可以设置no-cache。</p>

<h2 style="color: #444444;">23、桌面图标</h2>
<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;link</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">rel</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-touch-icon"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">href</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"touch-icon-iphone.png"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">/&gt;</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;link</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">rel</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-touch-icon"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">sizes</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"76x76"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">href</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"touch-icon-ipad.png"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">/&gt;</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;link</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">rel</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-touch-icon"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">sizes</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"120x120"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">href</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"touch-icon-iphone-retina.png"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">/&gt;</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;link</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">rel</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-touch-icon"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">sizes</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"152x152"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">href</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"touch-icon-ipad-retina.png"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">/&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">iOS下针对不同设备定义不同的桌面图标。如果不定义则以当前屏幕截图作为图标。</p>

<h2 style="color: #444444;">24、启动画面</h2>
<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;link</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">rel</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-touch-startup-image"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">href</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"start.png"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">/&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">iOS下页面启动加载时显示的画面图片，避免加载时的白屏。</p>
<p style="color: #444444;">可以通过madia来指定不同的大小：</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="com" style="color: #880000;">&lt;!--iPhone--&gt;</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;link</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">href</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-touch-startup-image-320x460.png"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">media</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"(device-width: 320px)"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">rel</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-touch-startup-image"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">/&gt;</span><span class="com" style="color: #880000;">&lt;!-- iPhone Retina --&gt;</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;link</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">href</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-touch-startup-image-640x920.png"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">media</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"(device-width: 320px) and (-webkit-device-pixel-ratio: 2)"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">rel</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-touch-startup-image"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">/&gt;</span><span class="com" style="color: #880000;">&lt;!-- iPhone 5 --&gt;</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;link</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">rel</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-touch-startup-image"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">media</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"(device-width: 320px) and (device-height: 568px) and (-webkit-device-pixel-ratio: #008800;">"(device-width: 768px) and (orientation: portrait)"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">rel</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" #008800;">"(device-width: 768px) and (orientation: landscape)"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">rel</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-touch-startup-image"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">/&gt;</span><span class="com" style="color: #880000;">&lt;!-- iPad Retina portrait --&gt;</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;link</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">href</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-touch-startup-image-1536x2008.png"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">media</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"(device-width: 1536px) and (orientation: portrait) and (-webkit-device-pixel-ratio: 2)"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">rel</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-touch-startup-image"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">/&gt;</span><span class="com" style="color: #880000;">&lt;!-- iPad Retina landscape --&gt;</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;link</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">href</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-touch-startup-image-1496x2048.png"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">media</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"(device-width: 1536px) and (orientation: landscape) and (-webkit-device-pixel-ratio: 2)"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">rel</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"apple-touch-startup-image"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">/&gt;</span></code></pre>
<h2 style="color: #444444;">25、浏览器私有及其它meta</h2>
<p style="color: #444444;">以下属性在项目中没有应用过，可以写一个demo测试以下！</p>
<p style="color: #444444;"><strong>QQ浏览器私有</strong></p>
<p style="color: #444444;">全屏模式</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"x5-fullscreen"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"true"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">强制竖屏</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"x5-orientation"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"portrait"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">强制横屏</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"x5-orientation"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"landscape"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">应用模式</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"x5-page-mode"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"app"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;"><strong>UC浏览器私有</strong></p>
<p style="color: #444444;">全屏模式</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"full-screen"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"yes"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">强制竖屏</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"screen-orientation"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"portrait"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">强制横屏</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"screen-orientation"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"landscape"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">应用模式</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"browsermode"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"application"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;"><strong>其它</strong></p>
<p style="color: #444444;">针对手持设备优化，主要是针对一些老的不识别viewport的浏览器，比如黑莓</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"HandheldFriendly"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"true"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">微软的老式浏览器</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"MobileOptimized"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"320"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">windows phone 点击无高光</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;meta</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">name</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"msapplication-tap-highlight"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"no"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span></code></pre>
<h2 style="color: #444444;">26、 IOS中input键盘事件keyup、keydown、keypress支持不是很好</h2>
<p style="color: #444444;">问题是这样的，用input search做模糊搜索的时候，在键盘里面输入关键词，会通过ajax后台查询，然后返回数据，然后再对返回的数据进行关键词标红。用input监听键盘keyup事件，在安卓手机浏览器中是可以的，但是在ios手机浏览器中变红很慢，用输入法输入之后，并未立刻相应keyup事件，只有在通过删除之后才能相应！</p>
<p style="color: #444444;"><strong>解决办法：</strong></p>
<p style="color: #444444;">可以用html5的oninput事件去代替keyup</p>

<pre class="prettyprint prettyprinted"><code><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;input</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">type</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"text"</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">id</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"testInput"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;script</span><span class="atn" style="color: #660066;">type</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="atv" style="color: #008800;">"text/javascript"</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&gt;</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">
    document</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">getElementById</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'testInput'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">).</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">addEventListener</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">'input'</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">function</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">e</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">){</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">var</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> value </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">=</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> e</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">target</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">value</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">;</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">});</span><span class="tag" style="color: #000088;">&lt;/script&gt;</span></code></pre>
<p style="color: #444444;">然后就达到类似keyup的效果！</p>
<p style="color: #444444;">暂时整理以上几点有关手机网站建设更多的注意事项，后面会陆续补充！</p>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>[轉]装逼文本编辑器Atom + activate-power-mode插件</title>
		<link>http://blog.whatisit.cn/archives/1043</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 11 Dec 2015 03:44:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[tydqq]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.whatisit.cn/?p=1043</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h1 style="color: #555555;">Atom 编辑器</h1>
<p style="color: #555555;">Atom是Github推出的一个文本编辑器，搜索一下大概是给Web前端用的，最近比较火的是他的一个插件activate-power-mode，可以实现打字屏振效果。</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">用来装装逼还是挺适合的，本来想试试能不能像sublimetext一样能编译C/C++之类的文件，后来发现根本不行，google到的也只有一些零碎的makefile之类的东西，没什么卵用，</p><!--more-->


<p style="color: #555555;">所以现在这个文本编辑器真的只能用来装装逼。</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><img src="http://img.blog.csdn.net/20151202195420724?watermark/2/text/aHR0cDovL2Jsb2cuY3Nkbi5uZXQv/font/5a6L5L2T/fontsize/400/fill/I0JBQkFCMA==/dissolve/70/gravity/Center" alt="" /></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">话不多说，来看看具体怎么设置。</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">首先先下载这个文本编辑器</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><a style="color: #770000;" title="https://atom.io/" href="https://atom.io/" target="_blank">https://atom.io/</a></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">大小85.8MB，并且会很流氓的使用chrome风格的自动安装进系统盘目录，有洁癖的可以直接打住了。</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">然后到这里下载插件包</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><a style="color: #770000;" title="https://github.com/JoelBesada/activate-power-mode" href="https://github.com/JoelBesada/activate-power-mode" target="_blank">https://github.com/JoelBesada/activate-power-mode</a></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><img src="http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/847289/201512/847289-20151201144841718-632438099.jpg" alt="" /></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">解压文件到下面的目录</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><img src="http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/847289/201512/847289-20151201145626937-1596497084.png" alt="" /></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">注意文件目录是带.atom的packages目录下，不要和文件运行的目录，很相似的路径搞混了，不然是安装不成功的</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"> <img src="http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/847289/201512/847289-20151201150501843-700558165.png" alt="" /></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">然后在命令提示符（可能需要管理员权限运行）中进入</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">C:\Users\你的用户名\.atom\packages\activate-power-mode</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">运行</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">apm install</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><img src="http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/847289/201512/847289-20151201145127202-2092714224.png" alt="" /></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">如图所示看到显示</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">Installing modules done</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">就说明安装成功了</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">运行Atom编辑器，按Ctrl + Alt + O（注意是O（欧）不是0（零））</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">或者在菜单中开启</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><img src="http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/847289/201512/847289-20151201150858046-734610133.png" alt="" /></p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">如果只想要粒子效果，不要屏振，可以打开</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">C:\Users\你的用户名\.atom\packages\activate-power-mode\lib\activate-power-mode.coffee</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">修改53行的x,y值，我改成了下面这样</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><img src="http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/847289/201512/847289-20151201151203905-246684207.png" alt="" /></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">写了个振动范围，你也可以写成常数如0.00001这样就几乎看不到振动，也可以增加振幅，如果你不晕的话，比如振动个10像素之类的......</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">和一般游戏中的屏振没什么区别</p>
<p style="color: #555555;">顺便一提，这里@表示注释</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">from:http://www.cnblogs.com/kileyi/p/5010045.html</p>

<h1 style="color: #555555;"><a style="color: #0c89cf;" name="t1"></a>安装过程中可能遇见的问题</h1>
<p style="color: #555555;">有些同学在安装过程中，有安装不成功的问题，可能会出现下列红字，因为apm安装需要你有C++环境。</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><img src="http://img.blog.csdn.net/20151204134219948?watermark/2/text/aHR0cDovL2Jsb2cuY3Nkbi5uZXQv/font/5a6L5L2T/fontsize/400/fill/I0JBQkFCMA==/dissolve/70/gravity/SouthEast" alt="" /></p>
<p style="color: #555555;">可以通过下列命令来查看，如果缺少哪些，后将不会显示版本</p>
<p style="color: #555555;"><img src="http://img.blog.csdn.net/20151204133705885?watermark/2/text/aHR0cDovL2Jsb2cuY3Nkbi5uZXQv/font/5a6L5L2T/fontsize/400/fill/I0JBQkFCMA==/dissolve/70/gravity/SouthEast" alt="" /></p>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1043</wp:post_id>

		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>%e8%bd%89%e8%a3%85%e9%80%bc%e6%96%87%e6%9c%ac%e7%bc%96%e8%be%91%e5%99%a8atom-activate-power-mode%e6%8f%92%e4%bb%b6</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="category" nicename="development"><![CDATA[Development]]></category>

	<item>
				<title>CentOS一键安装shadowsocks脚本[转]</title>
		<link>http://blog.whatisit.cn/archives/1045</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 12 Dec 2015 05:56:53 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[tydqq]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.whatisit.cn/?p=1045</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="color: #337fe5;"> Shadowsocks是一个基于python的轻量级socks代理软件,可以在任何系统简单的实现访问被屏蔽的网站。相比VPN来说，各有特色，网友也常称为科学上网，简称ss，在此分享与记录CentOS一键安装shadowsocks脚本。<!--more-->

</span><br style="color: #337fe5;" /><br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">一、使用root用户登录，运行以下命令</span><br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">       wget --no-check-certificate https://raw.githubusercontent.com/teddysun/shadowsocks_install/master/shadowsocks.sh &amp;&amp; chmod +x shadowsocks.sh &amp;&amp; ./shadowsocks.sh 2&gt;&amp;1 | tee shadowsocks.log</span><br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">二、安装时，会提示设置密码及端口信息，如下提示：</span>
<ol class="linenums">
	<li class="L0" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Congratulations</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> shadowsocks install completed</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">!</span><span style="color: #337fe5;"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">    </span></span></li>
	<li class="L0" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span style="color: #337fe5;"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">  </span></span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Your</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Server</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> IP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">your_server_ip </span><span style="color: #337fe5;"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">  </span></span></li>
	<li class="L0" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span style="color: #337fe5;"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">  </span></span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Your</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Server</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Port</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">8989</span><span style="color: #337fe5;"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">      </span></span></li>
	<li class="L0" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Your</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Password</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">your_password </span><span style="color: #337fe5;"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">      </span></span></li>
	<li class="L0" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Your</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Local</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> IP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">127.0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">0.1</span><span style="color: #337fe5;"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">     </span></span></li>
	<li class="L0" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span style="color: #337fe5;"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span></span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Your</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Local</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Port</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">1080</span><span style="color: #337fe5;"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">      </span></span></li>
	<li class="L0" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Your</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Encryption</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Method</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">aes</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">256</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">cfb </span><span style="color: #337fe5;"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">      </span></span></li>
	<li class="L0" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Welcome</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> to visit</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">http</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">://</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">teddysun</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">com</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">/</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">342.html</span><span style="color: #337fe5;"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">      </span></span></li>
	<li class="L0" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Enjoy</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> it</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">!</span><span id="copy_code" style="color: #ffffff;"></span>
<div id="zclip-ZeroClipboardMovie_1" class="zclip"></div></li>
</ol>
<br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">三、如果看到第二步提示，已经可以使用了。如果需要卸载，可以通过如下命令</span><br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">        ./shadowsocks.sh uninstall</span><br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">四、配置文件</span><br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">       配置文件路径为：/etc/shadowsocks.json</span><br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">       1、单用户配置：</span>
<ol class="linenums">
	<li class="L0" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">{</span></li>
	<li class="L1" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"server"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"your_server_ip"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L2" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"server_port"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">8989</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L3" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"local_address"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"127.0.0.1"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"local_port"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">1080</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L5" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"password"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"yourpassword"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L6" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"timeout"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">300</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L7" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"method"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"aes-256-cfb"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L8" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"fast_open"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> false</span></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span><span id="copy_code" style="color: #ffffff;"></span></li>
</ol>
<br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">       </span><span style="color: #337fe5;">2、多用户配置：</span>
<ol class="linenums">
	<li class="L0" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">{</span></li>
	<li class="L1" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"server"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"your_server_ip"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L2" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"local_address"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"127.0.0.1"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L3" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"local_port"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">1080</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"port_password"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:{</span></li>
	<li class="L5" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"8989"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"password0"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L6" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"9001"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"password1"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L7" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"9002"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"password2"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L8" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"9003"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"password3"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"9004"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"password4"</span></li>
	<li class="L0" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">},</span></li>
	<li class="L1" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"timeout"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">300</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L2" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"method"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"aes-256-cfb"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span></li>
	<li class="L3" style="color: #bbbbbb;"><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"fast_open"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="kwd" style="font-weight: bold; color: #000088;">false</span></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">}</span><span id="copy_code" style="color: #ffffff;"></span></li>
</ol>
<br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">五、相关使用命令</span><br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">       启动：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks start</span><br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">       停止：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks stop</span><br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">       重启：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks restart</span><br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">       状态：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks status</span><br style="color: #337fe5;" /><br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">六、使用下面命令可以查看连接用户的IP，其中的7890是你的SS端口</span><br style="color: #337fe5;" /><span style="color: #337fe5;">     </span><span style="color: #337fe5;"> </span><span style="color: #337fe5;">netstat -tun|grep 7890|sort|awk '{print $5}'|cut -d : -f 1|uniq </span>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
