	<item>
				<title>比较全面的CURL函数库中文说明</title>
		<link>http://blog.whatisit.cn/archives/1058</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 23 Dec 2015 05:25:50 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[tydqq]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.whatisit.cn/?p=1058</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="color: #323232;">比较全面的CURL函数库中文说明</span><br style="color: #323232;" /><span style="color: #323232;">省略了，有需要的朋友请查看原文</span><a style="color: #72b939;" href="http://www.jb100.net/html/content-22-736-1.html" target="_blank">http://www.jb100.net/html/content-22-736-1.html</a><code class="prettyprint linenums lang-php prettyprinted" style="color: #323232;"></code>
<ol class="linenums" style="color: #2ba5d8;"><!--more-->


	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">PHP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">中的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURL</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">函数库（</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Client</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> URL </span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Library</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Function</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">）</span></li>
	<li class="L1"></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_close </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">关闭一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">会话；</span></li>
	<li class="L3"></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_copy_handle </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">拷贝一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">连接资源的所有内容和参数；</span></li>
	<li class="L5"></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_errno </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">返回一个包含当前会话错误信息的数字编号；</span></li>
	<li class="L7"></li>
	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_error </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">返回一个包含当前会话错误信息的字符串；</span></li>
	<li class="L9"></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_exec </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">执行一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">会话；</span></li>
	<li class="L1"></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_getinfo </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">获取一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">连接资源句柄的信息；</span></li>
	<li class="L3"></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_init </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">初始化一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">会话；</span></li>
	<li class="L5"></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_add_handle </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">向</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">批处理会话中添加单独的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">句柄资源；</span></li>
	<li class="L7"></li>
	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_close </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">关闭一个批处理句柄资源；</span></li>
	<li class="L9"></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_exec </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">解析一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">批处理句柄；</span></li>
	<li class="L1"></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_getcontent </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">返回获取的输出的文本流；</span></li>
	<li class="L3"></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_info_read </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">获取当前解析的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的相关传输信息；</span></li>
	<li class="L5"></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_init </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">初始化一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">批处理句柄资源；</span></li>
	<li class="L7"></li>
	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_remove_handle </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">移除</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">批处理句柄资源中的某个句柄资源；</span></li>
	<li class="L9"></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_select </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Get</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> all the sockets associated </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">with</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> the cURL extension</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> which can </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">then</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> be </span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"selected"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">；</span></li>
	<li class="L1"></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_setopt_array </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">以数组的形式为一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">设置会话参数；</span></li>
	<li class="L3"></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_setopt </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">为一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">设置会话参数；</span></li>
	<li class="L5"></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_version </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">—</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">获取</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">相关的版本信息；</span></li>
	<li class="L7"></li>
	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_init</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用初始化一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">会话，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_init</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数唯一的一个参数是可选的，表示一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">url</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">地址；</span></li>
	<li class="L9"></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_exec</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用是执行一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">会话，唯一的参数是</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_init</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数返回的句柄；</span></li>
	<li class="L1"></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_close</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用是关闭一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">会话，唯一的参数是</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_init</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数返回的句柄；</span></li>
	<li class="L3"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_version</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用是获取</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">相关的版本信息，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_version</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数有一个参数，不清楚是做什么的；</span></li>
	<li class="L5"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_getinfo</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用是获取一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">连接资源句柄的信息，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_getinfo</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数有两个参数，第一个参数是</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的资源句柄，第二个参数是下面一些常量：</span></li>
	<li class="L7"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span></li>
	<li class="L8"></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">可选的常量包括：</span></li>
	<li class="L0"></li>
	<li class="L1"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_EFFECTIVE_URL</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：最后一个有效的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">url</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">地址；</span></li>
	<li class="L2"></li>
	<li class="L3"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：最后一个收到的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">代码；</span></li>
	<li class="L4"></li>
	<li class="L5"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_FILETIME</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：远程获取文档的时间，如果无法获取，则返回值为“-</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">1</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">”；</span></li>
	<li class="L6"></li>
	<li class="L7"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_TOTAL_TIME</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：最后一次传输所消耗的时间；</span></li>
	<li class="L8"></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_NAMELOOKUP_TIME</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：名称解析所消耗的时间；</span></li>
	<li class="L0"></li>
	<li class="L1"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_CONNECT_TIME</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：建立连接所消耗的时间；</span></li>
	<li class="L2"></li>
	<li class="L3"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_PRETRANSFER_TIME</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：从建立连接到准备传输所使用的时间；</span></li>
	<li class="L4"></li>
	<li class="L5"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_STARTTRANSFER_TIME</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：从建立连接到传输开始所使用的时间；</span></li>
	<li class="L6"></li>
	<li class="L7"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_REDIRECT_TIME</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：在事务传输开始前重定向所使用的时间；</span></li>
	<li class="L8"></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_SIZE_UPLOAD</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：上传数据量的总值；</span></li>
	<li class="L0"></li>
	<li class="L1"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_SIZE_DOWNLOAD</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：下载数据量的总值；</span></li>
	<li class="L2"></li>
	<li class="L3"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_SPEED_DOWNLOAD</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：平均下载速度；</span></li>
	<li class="L4"></li>
	<li class="L5"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_SPEED_UPLOAD</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：平均上传速度；</span></li>
	<li class="L6"></li>
	<li class="L7"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_HEADER_SIZE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">header</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">部分的大小；</span></li>
	<li class="L8"></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_HEADER_OUT</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：发送请求的字符串；</span></li>
	<li class="L0"></li>
	<li class="L1"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_REQUEST_SIZE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：在</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">请求中有问题的请求的大小；</span></li>
	<li class="L2"></li>
	<li class="L3"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_SSL_VERIFYRESULT</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Result</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> of SSL certification verification requested </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">by</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> setting CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">；</span></li>
	<li class="L4"></li>
	<li class="L5"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：从</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Length</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> field</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">中读取的下载内容长度；</span></li>
	<li class="L6"></li>
	<li class="L7"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_UPLOAD</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：上传内容大小的说明；</span></li>
	<li class="L8"></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_CONTENT_TYPE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：下载内容的“</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">type</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">”值，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">NULL</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">表示服务器没有发送有效的“</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Content</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Type</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> header</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">”；</span></li>
	<li class="L0"></li>
	<li class="L1"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_setopt</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用是为一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">设置会话参数。</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_setopt_array</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用是以数组的形式为一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">设置会话参数；</span></li>
	<li class="L2"></li>
	<li class="L3"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">可设置的参数有：</span></li>
	<li class="L4"></li>
	<li class="L5"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_AUTOREFERER</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：自动设置</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">header</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">中的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">referer</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">信息；</span></li>
	<li class="L6"></li>
	<li class="L7"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_BINARYTRANSFER</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：在启用</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">时候将获取数据返回；</span></li>
	<li class="L8"></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_COOKIESESSION</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：启用时</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">会仅仅传递一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">session cookie</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，忽略其他的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">cookie</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，默认状况下</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">会将所有的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">cookie</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">返回给服务端。</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">session cookie</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">是指那些用来判断服务器端的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">session</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">是否有效而存在的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">cookie</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">；</span></li>
	<li class="L0"></li>
	<li class="L1"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_CRLF</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：启用时将</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Unix</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的换行符转换成回车换行符；</span></li>
	<li class="L2"></li>
	<li class="L3"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_DNS_USE_GLOBAL_CACHE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：启用时会启用一个全局的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">DNS</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">缓存，此项为线程安全的，并且默认为</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">true</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">；</span></li>
	<li class="L4"></li>
	<li class="L5"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_FAILONERROR</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：显示</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">状态码，默认行为是忽略编号小于等于</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">400</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">信息；</span></li>
	<li class="L6"></li>
	<li class="L7"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_FILETIME</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：启用时会尝试修改远程文档中的信息。结果信息会通过</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_getinfo</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLINFO_FILETIME</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">选项返回；</span></li>
	<li class="L8"></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：启用时会将服务器服务器返回的“</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Location</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:”放在</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">header</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">中递归的返回给服务器，使用</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">可以限定递归返回的数量；</span></li>
	<li class="L0"></li>
	<li class="L1"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_FORBID_REUSE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：在完成交互以后强迫断开连接，不能重用；</span></li>
	<li class="L2"></li>
	<li class="L3"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_FRESH_CONNECT</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：强制获取一个新的连接，替代缓存中的连接；</span></li>
	<li class="L4"></li>
	<li class="L5"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_HEADER</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：启用时会将头文件的信息作为数据流输出；</span></li>
	<li class="L6"></li>
	<li class="L7"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_HTTPGET</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：启用时会设置</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">method</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">为</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">GET</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，因为</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">GET</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">是默认是，所以只在被修改的情况下使用；</span></li>
	<li class="L8"></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_HTTPPROXYTUNNEL</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：启用时会通过</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">代理来传输；</span></li>
	<li class="L0"></li>
	<li class="L1"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_MUTE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：讲</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">函数中所有修改过的参数恢复默认值；</span></li>
	<li class="L2"></li>
	<li class="L3"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_NETRC</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：在连接建立以后，访问~/.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">netrc</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">文件获取用户名和密码信息连接远程站点；</span></li>
	<li class="L4"></li>
	<li class="L5"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_NOBODY</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：启用时将不对</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTML</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">中的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">body</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">部分进行输出；</span></li>
	<li class="L6"></li>
	<li class="L7"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：启用时关闭</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">传输的进度条，此项的默认设置为</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">true</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">；</span></li>
	<li class="L8"></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_NOSIGNAL</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：启用时忽略所有的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">传递给</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">php</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">进行的信号。在</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">SAPI</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">多线程传输时此项被默认打开；</span></li>
	<li class="L0"></li>
	<li class="L1"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_POST</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：启用时会发送一个常规的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">POST</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">请求，类型为：</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">application</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">/</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">x</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">www</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">form</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">urlencoded</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，就像表单提交的一样；</span></li>
	<li class="L2"></li>
	<li class="L3"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_PUT</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：启用时允许</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">发送文件，必须同时设置</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_INFILE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">和</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_INFILESIZE</span></li>
	<li class="L4"></li>
	<li class="L5"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：将</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_exec</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()获取的信息以文件流的形式返回，而不是直接输出；</span></li>
	<li class="L6"></li>
	<li class="L7"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_UNRESTRICTED_AUTH</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：在使用</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">产生的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">header</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">中的多个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">locations</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">中持续追加用户名和密码信息，即使域名已发生改变；</span></li>
	<li class="L8"></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_UPLOAD</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：启用时允许文件传输；</span></li>
	<li class="L0"></li>
	<li class="L1"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_VERBOSE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：启用时会汇报所有的信息，存放在</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">STDERR</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">或指定的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_STDERR</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">中；</span></li>
	<li class="L2"></li>
	<li class="L3"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_BUFFERSIZE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：每次获取的数据中读入缓存的大小，这个值每次都会被填满；</span></li>
	<li class="L4"></li>
	<li class="L5"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_CLOSEPOLICY</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：不是</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLCLOSEPOLICY_LEAST_RECENTLY_USED</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">就是</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLCLOSEPOLICY_OLDEST</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，还存在另外三个，但是</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">暂时还不支持；</span></li>
	<li class="L6"></li>
	<li class="L7"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：在发起连接前等待的时间，如果设置为</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，则不等待；</span></li>
	<li class="L8"></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_DNS_CACHE_TIMEOUT</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置在内存中保存</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">DNS</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">信息的时间，默认为</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">120</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">秒；</span></li>
	<li class="L0"></li>
	<li class="L1"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">使用的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">协议，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURL_HTTP_VERSION_NONE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">（让</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">自己判断），</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">（</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">/</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">1.0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">），</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">（</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">/</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">1.1</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">）；</span></li>
	<li class="L2"></li>
	<li class="L3"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_HTTPAUTH</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：使用的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">验证方法，可选的值有：</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLAUTH_BASIC</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLAUTH_DIGEST</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLAUTH_GSSNEGOTIATE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLAUTH_NTLM</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLAUTH_ANY</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLAUTH_ANYSAFE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，可以使用“|”操作符分隔多个值，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">让服务器选择一个支持最好的值，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLAUTH_ANY</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">等价于</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLAUTH_BASIC </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">|</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> CURLAUTH_DIGEST </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">|</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> CURLAUTH_GSSNEGOTIATE </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">|</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> CURLAUTH_NTLM</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLAUTH_ANYSAFE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">等价于</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLAUTH_DIGEST </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">|</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> CURLAUTH_GSSNEGOTIATE </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">|</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> CURLAUTH_NTLM</span></li>
	<li class="L4"></li>
	<li class="L5"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_INFILESIZE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设定上传文件的大小；</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span></li>
	<li class="L6"></li>
	<li class="L7"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：当传输速度小于</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">时，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">PHP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">会根</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_LOW_SPEED_TIME</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">来判断是否因太慢而取消传输；</span></li>
	<li class="L8"></li>
	<li class="L9"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_LOW_SPEED_TIME</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">The</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> number of seconds the transfer should be below CURLOPT_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">for</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> PHP to consider the transfer too slow </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">and</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> abort</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">；</span></li>
	<li class="L0"></li>
	<li class="L1"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">当传输速度小于</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">时，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">PHP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">会根据</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_LOW_SPEED_TIME</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">来判断是否因太慢而取消传输；</span></li>
	<li class="L2"></li>
	<li class="L3"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_MAXCONNECTS</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：允许的最大连接数量，超过是会通过</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_CLOSEPOLICY</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">决定应该停止哪些连接；</span></li>
	<li class="L4"></li>
	<li class="L5"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：指定最多的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">重定向的数量，这个选项是和</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">一起使用的；</span></li>
	<li class="L6"></li>
	<li class="L7"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_PORT</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：一个可选的用来指定连接端口的量；</span></li>
	<li class="L8"></li>
	<li class="L9"></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_RESUME_FROM</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：在恢复传输时传递一个字节偏移量（用来断点续传）</span></li>
	<li class="L1"></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：</span></li>
	<li class="L3"></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">1</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> to check the existence of a common name </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">in</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> the SSL peer certificate</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span></li>
	<li class="L5"></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">2</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> to check the existence of a common name </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">and</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> also verify that it matches the hostname provided</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span></li>
	<li class="L7"></li>
	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_SSLVERSION</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">The</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> SSL version </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">2</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">or</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">3</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">)</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> to </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">use</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">By</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">default</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> PHP will </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">try</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> to determine </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">this</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> itself</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> although </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">in</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> some cases </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">this</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> must be </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">set</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> manually</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span></li>
	<li class="L9"></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_TIMECONDITION</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：如果在</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_TIMEVALUE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">指定的某个时间以后被编辑过，则使用</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURL_TIMECOND_IFMODSINCE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">返回页面，如果没有被修改过，并且</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_HEADER</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">为</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">true</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，则返回一个</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"304 Not Modified"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">header</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_HEADER</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">为</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">false</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，则使用</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURL_TIMECOND_ISUNMODSINCE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，默认值为</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURL_TIMECOND_IFMODSINCE</span></li>
	<li class="L1"></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_TIMEOUT</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">允许执行的最长秒数</span></li>
	<li class="L3"></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_TIMEVALUE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_TIMECONDITION</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">使用的时间戳，在默认状态下使用的是</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURL_TIMECOND_IFMODSINCE</span></li>
	<li class="L5"></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_CAINFO</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">The</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> name of a file holding one </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">or</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> more certificates to verify the peer </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">with</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">This</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> only makes sense </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">when</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> used </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">in</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> combination </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">with</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span></li>
	<li class="L7"></li>
	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_CAPATH</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">A directory that holds multiple CA certificates</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Use</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">this</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> option alongside CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span></li>
	<li class="L9"></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_COOKIE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设定</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">请求中“</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Set</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Cookie</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:”部分的内容。</span></li>
	<li class="L1"></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_COOKIEFILE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：包含</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">cookie</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">信息的文件名称，这个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">cookie</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">文件可以是</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Netscape</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">格式或者</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">风格的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">header</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">信息。</span></li>
	<li class="L3"></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_COOKIEJAR</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：连接关闭以后，存放</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">cookie</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">信息的文件名称</span></li>
	<li class="L5"></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_ENCODING</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">header</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">中“</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Accept</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Encoding</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">:</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">”部分的内容，支持的编码格式为：</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"identity"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"deflate"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"gzip"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">。如果设置为空字符串，则表示支持所有的编码格式</span></li>
	<li class="L7"></li>
	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_INTERFACE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：在外部网络接口中使用的名称，可以是一个接口名，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">IP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">或者主机名。</span></li>
	<li class="L9"></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_KRB4LEVEL</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">KRB4</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Kerberos</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">4</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">)安全级别的设置，可以是一下几个值之一：</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"clear"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"safe"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"confidential"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"private"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">。默认的值为</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"private"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，设置为</span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">null</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的时候表示禁用</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">KRB4</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">，现在</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">KRB4</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">安全仅能在</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">FTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">传输中使用。</span></li>
	<li class="L1"></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：在</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">中的“</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">POST</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">”操作。如果要传送一个文件，需要一个@开头的文件名</span></li>
	<li class="L3"></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_PROXY</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置通过的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">代理服务器</span></li>
	<li class="L5"></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_PROXYUSERPWD</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：连接到代理服务器的，格式为“[</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">username</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">]:[</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">password</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">]”的用户名和密码。</span></li>
	<li class="L7"></li>
	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_RANDOM_FILE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设定存放</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">SSL</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">用到的随机数种子的文件名称</span></li>
	<li class="L9"></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_RANGE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">传输范围，可以用“</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">X</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">Y</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">”的形式设置一个传输区间，如果有多个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">传输，则使用逗号分隔多个值，形如：</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"X-Y,N-M"</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">。</span></li>
	<li class="L1"></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_REFERER</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">header</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">中</span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"Referer: "</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">部分的值。</span></li>
	<li class="L3"></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_SSL_CIPHER_LIST</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">A list of ciphers to </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">use</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">for</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> SSL</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">For</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> example</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> RC4</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">SHA </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">and</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> </span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">TLSv1</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> are valid cipher lists</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span></li>
	<li class="L5"></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_SSLCERT</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：传递一个包含</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">PEM</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">格式证书的字符串。</span></li>
	<li class="L7"></li>
	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_SSLCERTPASSWD</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：传递一个包含使用</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_SSLCERT</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">证书必需的密码。</span></li>
	<li class="L9"></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_URL</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：需要获取的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">URL</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">地址，也可以在</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">PHP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_init</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数中设置。</span></li>
	<li class="L1"></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_USERAGENT</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：在</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">请求中包含一个”</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">user</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">-</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">agent</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">”头的字符串。</span></li>
	<li class="L3"></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_USERPWD</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：传递一个连接中需要的用户名和密码，格式为：“[</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">username</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">]:[</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">password</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">]”。</span></li>
	<li class="L5"></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_HTTP200ALIASES</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置不再以</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">error</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的形式来处理</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">HTTP </span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">200</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的响应，格式为一个数组。</span></li>
	<li class="L7"></li>
	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">header</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">中传输内容的数组。</span></li>
	<li class="L9"></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_POSTQUOTE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">An</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> array of FTP commands to execute on the server after the FTP request has been performed</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span></li>
	<li class="L1"></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_QUOTE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">An</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> array of FTP commands to execute on the server prior to the FTP request</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">.</span></li>
	<li class="L3"></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_FILE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置输出文件的位置，值是一个资源类型，默认为</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">STDOUT </span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">(浏览器)。</span></li>
	<li class="L5"></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_INFILE</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：在上传文件的时候需要读取的文件地址，值是一个资源类型。</span></li>
	<li class="L7"></li>
	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_STDERR</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置一个错误输出地址，值是一个资源类型，取代默认的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">STDERR</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">。</span></li>
	<li class="L9"></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_WRITEHEADER</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">header</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">部分内容的写入的文件地址，值是一个资源类型。</span></li>
	<li class="L1"></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_HEADERFUNCTION</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置一个回调函数，这个函数有两个参数，第一个是</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的资源句柄，第二个是输出的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">header</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">数据。</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">header</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">数据的输出必须依赖这个函数，返回已写入的数据大小。</span></li>
	<li class="L3"></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_PASSWDFUNCTION</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置一个回调函数，有三个参数，第一个是</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的资源句柄，第二个是一个密码提示符，第三个参数是密码长度允许的最大值。返回密码的值。</span></li>
	<li class="L5"></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_READFUNCTION</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置一个回调函数，有两个参数，第一个是</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的资源句柄，第二个是读取到的数据。数据读取必须依赖这个函数。返回读取数据的大小，比如</span><span class="lit" style="color: #006666;">0</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">或者</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">EOF</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">。</span></li>
	<li class="L7"></li>
	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">：设置一个回调函数，有两个参数，第一个是</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的资源句柄，第二个是写入的数据。数据写入必须依赖这个函数。返回精确的已写入数据的大小</span></li>
	<li class="L9"></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_copy_handle</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用是拷贝一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">连接资源的所有内容和参数</span></li>
	<li class="L1"></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_error</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用是返回一个包含当前会话错误信息的字符串。</span></li>
	<li class="L3"></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_errno</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用是返回一个包含当前会话错误信息的数字编号。</span></li>
	<li class="L5"></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_init</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用是初始化一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">批处理句柄资源。</span></li>
	<li class="L7"></li>
	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_add_handle</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用是向</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">批处理会话中添加单独的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">句柄资源。</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_add_handle</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数有两个参数，第一个参数表示一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">批处理句柄资源，第二个参数表示一个单独的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">句柄资源。</span></li>
	<li class="L9"></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_exec</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用是解析一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">批处理句柄，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_exec</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数有两个参数，第一个参数表示一个批处理句柄资源，第二个参数是一个引用值的参数，表示剩余需要处理的单个的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">句柄资源数量。</span></li>
	<li class="L1"></li>
	<li class="L2"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_remove_handle</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数表示移除</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">批处理句柄资源中的某个句柄资源，</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_remove_handle</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数有两个参数，第一个参数表示一个</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">批处理句柄资源，第二个参数表示一个单独的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">句柄资源。</span></li>
	<li class="L3"></li>
	<li class="L4"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_close</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用是关闭一个批处理句柄资源。</span></li>
	<li class="L5"></li>
	<li class="L6"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_getcontent</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用是在设置了</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的情况下，返回获取的输出的文本流。</span></li>
	<li class="L7"></li>
	<li class="L8"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_info_read</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()函数的作用是获取当前解析的</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">的相关传输信息。</span></li>
	<li class="L9"></li>
	<li class="L0"><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;">curl_multi_select</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">()：</span><span class="typ" style="color: #660066;">Get</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> all the sockets associated </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">with</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> the cURL extension</span><span class="pun" style="color: #666600;">,</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> which can </span><span class="kwd" style="color: #000088;">then</span><span class="pln" style="color: #000000;"> be </span><span class="str" style="color: #008800;">"selected"</span></li>
</ol>
<code class="prettyprint linenums lang-php prettyprinted" style="color: #323232;"></code>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>[轉]SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate SOLVED</title>
		<link>http://blog.whatisit.cn/archives/1062</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 23 Dec 2015 06:14:43 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[tydqq]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.whatisit.cn/?p=1062</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>The issue</h2>
Today I was trying to consume an external video API for streaming a set of videos; so I got the code for the PHP source, create all my configuration but when I tried to get the actual data from the external server via cURL; I was obtaining nothing; so, in order to get the error’s message, this is what I did:<!--more-->


<div>
<pre class="bash">var_dump(curl_error(<span class="variable" style="color: #008080;">$ch</span>));</pre>
</div>
Which basically gets the error after the connection. The message was the following one:

SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate
<h2>The solution</h2>
1) Download the certificate from <a style="font-weight: bold; font-style: italic; color: #949494;" href="http://curl.haxx.se/ca/cacert.pem" target="_blank" rel="nofollow,noindex">http://curl.haxx.se/ca/cacert.pem</a>

2) Create a folder under your home:
<div>
<pre class="perl"><span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold;">mkdir</span> /Users/alex/ssl</pre>
</div>
3) Copy or move the file with the certificate you just downloaded:
<div>
<pre class="undefined">mv /Users/alex/Downloads/cacert.pem /Users/alex/ssl</pre>
</div>
4) Open your php.ini and look for this directive <strong>curl.cainfo</strong> (the path should vary, depending on your system or meta-package you are using: WAMP, XAMPP, AMPPS have different paths).
<div>
<pre class="prettyprint cs">[curl]
; A <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold;">default</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold;">value</span> <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold;">for</span> the CURLOPT_CAINFO option. This <span class="keyword" style="font-weight: bold;">is</span> required to be an
; absolute path.
curl.cainfo =</pre>
</div>
5) Type there you path to the certificate; for example in my case, this was the configuration I did:
<div>
<pre class="ruby">curl.cainfo = <span class="regexp" style="color: #009926;">/Users/alex</span><span class="regexp" style="color: #009926;">/ssl/cacert</span>.pem</pre>
</div>
6) Restart your Apache.

7) Enjoy!]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:post_date_gmt>2015-12-23 06:14:43</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>%e8%bd%89ssl-certificate-problem-unable-to-get-local-issuer-certificate-solved</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="category" nicename="development"><![CDATA[Development]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="serveice-for-net"><![CDATA[Serveice for Net]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_edit_last</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>duoshuo_thread_id</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[6231358815875367681]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
	</item>
	<item>
				<title>U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统</title>
		<link>http://blog.whatisit.cn/archives/1065</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 24 Dec 2015 04:15:14 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[tydqq]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.whatisit.cn/?p=1065</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="exp-title clearfix" style="color: #000000;">
<h1 style="font-weight: 400;" title="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统">[轉]U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统</h1>
</div>
<div id="format-exp" class="exp-content format-exp" style="color: #000000;">
<div class="exp-content-block">
<div class="exp-content-body exp-brief-step">
<div class="exp-content-listblock">
<div class="content-listblock-text">

centos7除了之后，就像尝鲜看看，但是发现安装之后会失去win8启动项。导致重装系统，经过反复折腾，终于搞定了，发出来共享下。默认你的window系统已经安装好，不介绍window安装过程。<!--more-->

本文的重点在于两点：一、设置参数，让centos安装系统可以正常启动；二、安装完成之后，设置启动参数，让系统可以进入window。其他的讲的不详细，请见谅。

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="exp-content-block">
<h2 class="exp-content-head" style="font-weight: 400;"><a style="color: #2d64b3;" name="section-2"></a>工具/原料</h2>
<div class="exp-content-body">
<ul class="exp-content-unorderlist ">
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-1">
<div class="content-list-text">centos7安装盘</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-2">
<div class="content-list-text">软碟通，英文名UltraISO</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-3">
<div class="content-list-text">8G优盘一个</div></li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<div class="exp-content-block">
<h2 class="exp-content-head" style="font-weight: 400;"><a style="color: #2d64b3;" name="section-3"></a>方法/步骤</h2>
<div class="exp-content-body">
<ol class="exp-conent-orderlist">
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-1">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;">1</div>
<div class="content-list-text">

下载centos安装盘。度娘搜索centos，第一条结果就是centos官网。这个不是重点，所以就简介吧！建议使用CentOS-7.0-1406-x86_64-DVD.iso。文件小，下载快，可以在使用过程中根据需求自己添加新功能。

</div>
<div class="content-list-media">
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=1" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://d.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=76cda6e73a01213fcf334edc64e636f8/dc54564e9258d10948033b8cd258ccbf6c814d28.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=2" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://h.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=4f7293c99c3df8dca63d8f91fd1072bf/0e2442a7d933c895eefe0545d21373f08202000f.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-2">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;">2</div>
<div class="content-list-text">

打开软碟通（ultraISO），选择打开镜像文件。刻录过程也是千篇一律，如果不懂可以参考我写的《用U盘制作win7/8启动盘，用U盘安装》，复制搜索就行。制作启动盘完全一致。

</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-3">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;">3</div>
<div class="content-list-text">

压缩硬盘，为linux安装腾出空间。在“我的电脑（win8为这台电脑）”上右键，选择“管理”。在出来的计算机管理界面上点击“磁盘管理”，会出现所有的磁盘。

</div>
<div class="content-list-media">
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=3" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://f.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=2836343be6dde711e7d243f697efcef4/b03533fa828ba61e55874c114234970a304e59a7.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-4">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;">4</div>
<div class="content-list-text">

选择你要压缩的盘，右键选择压缩。输入自己想要压缩的容量。准备好上面几步之后就可以开始安装了。

</div>
<div class="content-list-media">
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=4" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://d.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=6ae12604334e251fe2f7e4f89787c9c2/5366d0160924ab18bcfe650936fae6cd7b890b27.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=5" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://b.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=b03f1f45d21373f0f53f6f9f940f4b8b/8601a18b87d6277fff53b5062b381f30e924fc4f.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-5">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;">5</div>
<div class="content-list-text">

重启电脑之前，请注意。你要确信知道如何让你的电脑从优盘启动，不同的电脑不一样，可以根据自己的电脑品牌去搜索，这里不做详细介绍。做好准备之后就重启电脑吧！

</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-6">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;">6</div>
<div class="content-list-text">

选择从优盘启动，然后就会看到如下界面。可能不同电脑会有所差距。下面的一步很重要，决定了能不能顺利的从优盘启动。

</div>
<div class="content-list-media">
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=6" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://h.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=cc96b948f11fbe091c5ec3145b600c30/902397dda144ad34eedf01b9d3a20cf431ad85a8.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-7">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;">7</div>
<div class="content-list-text">

把光标移动到install centos7，然后根据提示，按相应的键，比如我的提示是按TAB键。按键之后，会进入编辑界面。重点来老哦！

</div>
<div class="content-list-media">
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=7" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://g.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=8ef6f22d0af79052ef1f473e3cf3d738/5243fbf2b21193131e2c7e8e66380cd791238da5.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-8">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;">8</div>
<div class="content-list-text">

编辑“&gt;vmlinux initrd=initrd.img inst.stage2=hd:LABEL=CentOS\x207\x20x86_64 quiet”这句话。把其中的“CentOS\x207\x20x86_64”改为“/dev/sdb4”，现在的硬盘一般都是sata的接口，所以是sdb，4代表是你优盘是第几个分区。如果你有C、D、E三个分区，那么就是4，如果你的事CDEF四个分区，那么应该是5。即修改之后为：“&gt;vmlinux initrd=initrd.img inst.stage2=hd:LABEL=/dev/sdb4 quiet”。修改之后不同的电脑好像有所区别，我的电脑是直接回车就可以执行，而有些电脑是“ctrl+x”执行。

</div>
<div class="content-list-media">
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=8" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://e.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=d55f7de175094b36db921bed93cd7c00/bd315c6034a85edf69437d1d4a540923dc5475c5.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-9">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;"></div>
<div class="content-list-text">

如果中间有提示，按照提示来，顺利进入安装界面。然后选择自己想要的语言。

</div>
<div class="content-list-media">
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=9" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://c.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=c6f7fcf5f8edab6474724dc0c737af81/29381f30e924b899cbf9fb066d061d950b7bf6c3.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-10">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;"></div>
<div class="content-list-text">

遇到了今天的第二个注意点。修改“软件选择”，不然就是最小安装。

</div>
<div class="content-list-media">
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=10" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://d.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=8f3b2ce0f31f3a295ac8d5cea925bce3/c8177f3e6709c93d73a083c99c3df8dcd10054b9.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-11">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;"></div>
<div class="content-list-text">

根据自己的选择，选择功能吧！

</div>
<div class="content-list-media">
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=11" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://a.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=d45ed58f830a19d8cb03840503fb82c9/a5c27d1ed21b0ef403341460dec451da81cb3e2b.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-12">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;"></div>
<div class="content-list-text">

最后修改下安装分区吧，根据自己的需求分区吧！如果有相关经验就自己分，没有就选择自动分区。注意一点，不要选择优盘就行。

</div>
<div class="content-list-media">
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=12" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://c.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=f0428089ea50352ab16125086342fb1a/9a504fc2d56285352f6c5d1f93ef76c6a7ef6304.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-13">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;"></div>
<div class="content-list-text">

然后点击开始安装，在接下来创建root密码和账户。做完之后就等他安装结束吧！

</div>
<div class="content-list-media">
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=13" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://c.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=f28081272ef5e0feee1889016c6134e5/6609c93d70cf3bc79da243d2d200baa1cd112a69.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-14">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;"></div>
<div class="content-list-text">

安装结束之后重启。

</div>
<div class="content-list-media">
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=14" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://c.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=3cbc5e18fefaaf5184e381bfbc5594ed/960a304e251f95ca236f6488ca177f3e67095272.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-15">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;"></div>
<div class="content-list-text">

重启之后是没有win7/win8选项的，选择第一个选项直接进入系统。进入系统时还要对其进行许可设置。点击同意就可以。至于要不要启动“Kdump”根据自己的需求选择吧！设置好要重启，这次重启就开始第三个重点了。

</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-16">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;"></div>
<div class="content-list-text">

启动终端。到“/boot/grub2/“里找到了grub的配置文件 grub.cfg，修改这个文件来确定启动菜单。

</div>
<div class="content-list-media">
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=15" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://b.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=d350cafdd4ca7bcb7d7bc72f8e096b3f/cb8065380cd791233683674aae345982b2b780a9.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-17">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;"></div>
<div class="content-list-text">

在两个menuentry中间添加一个win8.1启动设置，具体参数是

menuentry  ‘win8.1’{

set root=(hd0,1)

chainloader +1

}

然后保存就可以了。最好不要直接copy上面的参数，免得出现中英文错误。报错即可。

</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-18">
<div class="list-icon" style="color: #eeffee;"></div>
<div class="content-list-text">

重新启动就可以看到win8.1启动选项了。

</div>
<div class="content-list-media">
<div class="content-list-image clearfix"><a class="exp-image-wraper" style="color: #2d64b3;" href="http://jingyan.baidu.com/album/1709ad80b28cf74634c4f0d5.html?picindex=16" target="_self"><img class="exp-image-default" src="http://a.hiphotos.baidu.com/exp/w=500/sign=920a1d07b0de9c82a665f98f5c8180d2/fd039245d688d43f87c668cc7e1ed21b0ef43ba4.jpg" alt="U盘安装win8(win7)+centos7双系统" /></a></div>
</div></li>
	<li class="exp-content-list list-item-18">&nbsp;</li>
</ol>
</div>
</div>
